# Flutter

Flutter 谷歌的移动UI框架 可以快速在IOS Android 上构建高质量 原生用户界面

Flutter 可以与现有代码一起工作 Flutter 免费开源

Flutter 采用GPU渲染技术 性能高

主流框架

RN (React Native)

Flutter 120fps 高性能

Vscode 插件

Flutter Widget Snippets
Awesome Flutter Snippets

# 构建失败解决方法

这是因为Gradle的Maven仓库在国外, 可以使用阿里云的镜像地址。

1.修改项目中android/build.gradle文件

buildscript {
    ext.kotlin_version = '1.3.50'
    repositories {
        // 修改
        // google()
        // jcenter()
        maven { url 'https://maven.aliyun.com/repository/google' }
        maven { url 'https://maven.aliyun.com/repository/jcenter' }
        maven { url 'http://maven.aliyun.com/nexus/content/groups/public' }

}
 
    dependencies {
        classpath 'com.android.tools.build:gradle:3.5.0'
        classpath "org.jetbrains.kotlin:kotlin-gradle-plugin:$kotlin_version"
    }
}

allprojects {
    repositories {
        // 修改
        // google()
        // jcenter()
        maven { url 'https://maven.aliyun.com/repository/google' }
        maven { url 'https://maven.aliyun.com/repository/jcenter' }
        maven { url 'http://maven.aliyun.com/nexus/content/groups/public' }
    }
}

# Vscode 开发Flutter

# 建立p处理文件 开启虚拟机

EmulatorRun 运行虚拟机

桌面建立 EmulatorRun.bat 文件

安装文件路径 emulator\emulator.exe 文件

配置参数

C:\Users\Master\AppData\Local\Android\Sdk\emulator\emulator.exe -netdelay none -netspeed full -avd Pixel_3a_API_28
1

-netdelay none -netspeed full 状态全速

-avd 开启虚拟机

Pixel_3a_API_28 Android Stodio 虚拟机名称 空格下换线代替

双击打开虚拟机

cd 项目文件夹 
flutter run   建立依赖
1
2

Awesome Flutter Snippetsnash. 快速生产代码插件

flutter create demo01

lib\main.dart 入口文件

	runApp(MyApp());

初始代码

import 'package:flutter/material.dart'; //引入UI库

void main() {
  runApp(new Center(
    child:new Text(
      'Hello world',
      textDirection: TextDirection.ltr, //文字显示方式从左到右
    )
  ));
}
// new 可省略 执行实例化

        child: Text(
        '你好Flutter',
        textDirection: TextDirection.ltr, //文字显示方式从左到右

  } //无状态组件

添加style样式

import 'package:flutter/material.dart'; //引入UI库

void main() {
  runApp(MyApp());
}

//自定义组件
class MyApp extends StatelessWidget {
  @override
  Widget build(BuildContext context) {
    return Center(
        child: Text(
        '你好Flutter',
        textDirection: TextDirection.ltr, //文字显示方式从左到右
        style: TextStyle(
          fontSize: 40.0, //默认double类型   等同40px
          color: Colors.yellow,
          // color: Color.fromRGBO(244, 2333, 121, 0.5)
        ),
      ));
  } //无状态组件

}

# 使用组件

MaterialApp 和 Scaffold

MaterialApp 一般用于根组件 封装了应用程序实现Material Design所需的 Widget

常用属性

home 主页
title 标题
color 颜色
theme 主题
routes 路由

Scaffold

appBar 显示界面顶部AppBar

body 当前界面所显示的主要内容 Widget

drawer 抽屉菜单控件

demo2

import 'package:flutter/material.dart'; //引入UI库

void main() {
  runApp(MyApp());
}

//自定义组件
class MyApp extends StatelessWidget {
  @override
  Widget build(BuildContext context) {
    return MaterialApp(//根组件主体
      home: Scaffold(
        appBar: AppBar( //添加 导航
          title: Text('Flutter Demo'),
        ),
        body: HomeContent(), //主体内容 
      ),
      theme: ThemeData(
        primarySwatch: Colors.yellow,//添加主题样式
      ),
    );
  } //无状态组件

}

// 抽离主体区域
class HomeContent extends StatelessWidget {
  @override
  Widget build(BuildContext context) {
    return Center(
        child: Text(
      '你好Flutter',
      textDirection: TextDirection.ltr, //文字显示方式从左到右
      style: TextStyle(
        fontSize: 40.0,
        color: Colors.yellow,
        // color: Color.fromRGBO(244, 2333, 121, 0.5)
      ),
    ));
  }
}

# Flutter Container Text 组件

demo3

import 'package:flutter/material.dart'; //引入UI库

void main() => {runApp(MyApp())};

class MyApp extends StatelessWidget { //覆盖重写
  @override
  Widget build(BuildContext context) {
    return MaterialApp(
      home: Scaffold(
        appBar: AppBar(
          title: Text("Flutter Demo"),
        ),
        body: HomeContent()
      ),
    );
  }
}

//抽离body组件
class HomeContent extends StatelessWidget {
  @override
  Widget build(BuildContext context) {
    return Center(
          child: Container( //添加容器组件
            child: Text('XXXXXX',
              textAlign: TextAlign.center,
              overflow: TextOverflow.ellipsis,//超出裁剪
              maxLines: 1,//最多一行
              textScaleFactor: 2, //放大两倍
              style:TextStyle(
                fontSize: 16.0,
                color: Colors.black,
                fontWeight: FontWeight.w400,
                fontStyle: FontStyle.italic, //倾斜
                decoration: TextDecoration.lineThrough,//删除线
                decorationColor: Colors.red,
                decorationStyle: TextDecorationStyle.dashed, //虚线
                letterSpacing: 2.0, //字间距
              )
            ),
            height: 300.0, //容器宽
            width: 300.0, //容器高
            decoration: BoxDecoration(
              color: Colors.pink,
              //添加圆角
              borderRadius: BorderRadius.all(Radius.circular(150)),
              border: Border.all(
                color:Colors.blue,//添加边框
                width:2.0
              ),
              grdient:const LinearGradient(
              	colors:[Colors.lightBlue,Colors.greenAccent,Colors.purple]//渐变背景
              )
            ),

            // padding: EdgeInsets.all(20),  //内边距
            padding: EdgeInsets.fromLTRB(10, 30, 5, 0),
			
            // transform: Matrix4.translationValues(100, 0, 0),
            transform:  Matrix4.rotationZ(0.4),
            alignment: Alignment.bottomRight,//容器位置
             
          ),
        );
  }
}

# 图片组件 Image

Image.asset 本地图片

Image.network 远程图片

# 引入远程图片

import 'package:flutter/material.dart'; //引入UI库

void main() => {runApp(MyApp())};

class MyApp extends StatelessWidget {
  @override
  Widget build(BuildContext context) {
    return MaterialApp(
      home: Scaffold(
        appBar: AppBar(
          title: Text("Flutter Demo"),
        ),
        body: Center(
          child: Container(
            child: Image.network("https://gitee.com/master0037/publicImg/raw/master/0007.jpg",
            repeat: ImageRepeat.repeatX, /// 横向平铺
            alignment: Alignment.bottomCenter,
            color: Colors.pink,
            colorBlendMode: BlendMode.screen,
            
            fit: BoxFit.cover, //配置图片显示效果

            repeat: ImageRepeat.repeat, //平铺

            ),//Image
            width: 300,
            height: 300,
            decoration: BoxDecoration(
              color: Colors.yellow
            ),
          ),

        ),
      ),
    );
  }
}

# 实现圆角和实现圆形图片

第一种方法

import 'package:flutter/material.dart'; //引入UI库

void main() => {runApp(MyApp())};

class MyApp extends StatelessWidget {
  @override
  Widget build(BuildContext context) {
    return MaterialApp(
      home: Scaffold(
        appBar: AppBar(
          title: Text("Flutter Demo"),
        ),
        body: Center(
          child: Container(
            width: 300,
            height: 300,
            
            decoration: BoxDecoration(
              color: Colors.yellow,
              // borderRadius: BorderRadius.all(
              //   Radius.circular(150),
              // )
              borderRadius: BorderRadius.circular(150), //改变容器为圆角
              image: DecorationImage(
                image:NetworkImage("https://gitee.com/master0037/publicImg/raw/master/0002.jpg"),
                fit:BoxFit.cover
              )
            ),
          ),
        ),
    ));
  }
}

第二种方法

container > clipOval 属性

import 'package:flutter/material.dart'; //引入UI库

void main() => {runApp(MyApp())};

class MyApp extends StatelessWidget {
  @override
  Widget build(BuildContext context) {
    return MaterialApp(
      home: Scaffold(
        appBar: AppBar(
          title: Text("Flutter Demo"),
        ),
        body: Center(
          child: Container( //设置
           child: ClipOval(
             child: Image.network(
             "https://gitee.com/master0037/publicImg/raw/master/longImg2.jpg",
             height:300,
             width: 300,
             fit:BoxFit.cover
             ),
           ),
          ),
        ),
    ));
  }
}

# 引入本地图片

建立目录结构

./images

​		——— /2.0x

		——— /3.0x

		——— /4.0x
1
2
3
4
5
6
7

修改 ./pubspec.yaml 文件

 flutter:

     
  uses-material-design: true
  assets:
    - images/001.jpg
    - images/2.0x/001.jpg
    - images/3.0x/001.jpg

8

编写本地图片代码


class MyApp extends StatelessWidget {
  @override
  Widget build(BuildContext context) {
    return MaterialApp(
      home: Scaffold(
        appBar: AppBar(
          title: Text("Flutter Demo"),
        ),
        body: Center(
          child: Container(
           child: Image.asset('images/001.jpg'),
          ),
        ),
    ));
  }
}

# ListView

# ListView 基础列表组件

主要用于 新闻列表布局

分类

垂直列表		垂直图文列表 		水平列表
动态列表		矩阵式列表
1
2

参数

名称 类型 说明
scrollDirection Axis Axis.horizontal 水平列表 Axis.vertical 垂直列表
padding EdgeInsetsGeometry 内边距
resolve bool 组件反向排序
children List 列表元素

简单 图文 列表

import 'package:flutter/material.dart'; //引入UI库

void main() => {runApp(MyApp())};

class MyApp extends StatelessWidget {
  @override
  Widget build(BuildContext context) {
    return MaterialApp(
      home: Scaffold(
        appBar: AppBar(
          title: Text("Flutter Demo"),
        ),
        body: HomeContent(),
      ),
    );
  }
}

class HomeContent extends StatelessWidget {
  @override
  Widget build(BuildContext context) {
    // TODO: implement build
    return ListView(
      // scrollDirection: Axis.horizontal  //设置 为水平方向列表
      padding: EdgeInsets.all(10),//设置内边距
      children: <Widget>[ //添加列表
        Image.network("https://www.ityng.com/images/flutter/1.png"),
        Container(
          child: Text("Title",
          textAlign: TextAlign.center,
          style: TextStyle(
            fontSize: 28.0
          ),
         ),
          height: 10,
          padding: EdgeInsets.fromLTRB(0, 10, 0, 10),
        ),
        Image.network("https://www.ityng.com/images/flutter/2.png"),
         Container(
          child: Text("Title",
          textAlign: TextAlign.center,
          style: TextStyle(
            fontSize: 28.0
          ),
          ),
          height: 10,
          padding: EdgeInsets.fromLTRB(0, 10, 0, 10),
        ),
        Image.network("https://www.ityng.com/images/flutter/3.png"),
         Container(
          child: Text("Title",
          textAlign: TextAlign.center,
          style: TextStyle(
            fontSize: 28.0
          ),
          ),
          height: 10,
          padding: EdgeInsets.fromLTRB(0, 10, 0, 10),
        ),
        Image.network("https://www.ityng.com/images/flutter/4.png"),

水平图文列表

import 'package:flutter/material.dart'; //引入UI库

void main() => {runApp(MyApp())};

class MyApp extends StatelessWidget {
  @override
  Widget build(BuildContext context) {
    return MaterialApp(
      home: Scaffold(
        appBar: AppBar(
          title: Text("Flutter Demo"),
        ),
        body: HomeContent(),
      ),
    );
  }
}

class HomeContent extends StatelessWidget {
  @override
  Widget build(BuildContext context) {
    // TODO: implement build
    return Container(
      height: 180.0,
      child: ListView(//添加父级元素添加宽度
      scrollDirection: Axis.horizontal,//水平列表
      padding: EdgeInsets.all(10),//设置内边距
      children: <Widget>[
          Container(
            width: 180.0,
            color: Colors.red,
          ),
          Container(
            width: 180.0,
            color: Colors.yellow,
            child: ListView( //子元素嵌套ListView
              children: <Widget>[
                Image.network("https://gitee.com/master0037/publicImg/raw/master/longImg2.jpg"),
                Text('我是一个文本')
              ],
            ),
          ),
          Container(
            width: 180.0,
            color: Colors.blue,
          ),
          Container(
            width: 180.0,
            color: Colors.pink,
          ),
          ],
        ),
    );
  }
}

# ListView 列表组件 动态列表

dynamic 动态

Test 代码

import 'package:flutter/material.dart'; //引入UI库

void main() => {runApp(MyApp())};

class MyApp extends StatelessWidget {
  @override
  Widget build(BuildContext context) {
    return MaterialApp(
      home: Scaffold(
        appBar: AppBar(
          title: Text("Flutter Demo"),
        ),
        body: HomeContent(), //挂在虚拟list
      ),
    );
  }
}

class HomeContent extends StatelessWidget {
  //模拟静态列表数据

  //自定义方法    快速生成列表项
  List<Widget> _getData() {
    List<Widget> list = new List();

    for (var i = 0; i < 20; i++) {
      list.add(ListTile(
        title: Text("I am $i List"),
      ));
    }//循环结束调用一次
    return list;//转换数组
  }

  @override
  Widget build(BuildContext context) {
    return ListView(children: this._getData());
  }
}

渲染 动态列表

import 'package:flutter/material.dart'; //引入UI库
import './res/listData.dart'; //引入伪数据

void main() => {runApp(MyApp())};

class MyApp extends StatelessWidget {
  @override
  Widget build(BuildContext context) {
    return MaterialApp(
      home: Scaffold(
        appBar: AppBar(
          title: Text("Flutter Demo"),
        ),
        body: HomeContent(),
      ),
    );
  }
}



//添加主体自定义组件
class HomeContent extends StatelessWidget {
  //模拟静态列表数据

  //自定义方法 
  List<Widget> _getData() {
    var template = listData.map((value) { //进行解构
      return ListTile( //返回列表 
        leading: Image.network(value["imageUrl"]),
        title: Text(value["title"]),
        subtitle: Text(value["author"]),
      );
    });

    return template.toList();
  }

  @override
  Widget build(BuildContext context) {
    return ListView(children: this._getData());
  }
}

ListView.buildr 实现

实例一

import 'package:flutter/material.dart'; //引入UI库
import './res/listData.dart'; //引入伪数据

void main() => {runApp(MyApp())};

class MyApp extends StatelessWidget {
  @override
  Widget build(BuildContext context) {
    return MaterialApp(
      home: Scaffold(
        appBar: AppBar(
          title: Text("Flutter Demo"),
        ),
        body: HomeContent(),
      ),
    );
  }
}

class HomeContent extends StatelessWidget {
  List list = new List();
  HomeContent() {
    for (var i = 0; i < 30; i++) {
      this.list.add('i am $i item');
    }
  }

  //模拟静态列表数据
  @override
  Widget build(BuildContext context) {
    return ListView.builder(//使用 listview.builder
      itemCount: this.list.length, //指定长度
      itemBuilder: (context, index) {
        return ListTile(
          //返回一个组件
          title: Text(this.list[index]),
        );
      },
    );
  }
}

实例二

import 'package:flutter/material.dart'; //引入UI库
import './res/listData.dart'; //引入伪数据

void main() => {runApp(MyApp())};

class MyApp extends StatelessWidget {
  @override
  Widget build(BuildContext context) {
    return MaterialApp(
      home: Scaffold(
        appBar: AppBar(
          title: Text("Flutter Demo"),
        ),
        body: HomeContent(),
      ),
    );
  }
}

class HomeContent extends StatelessWidget {
  
  //自定义方法 
  Widget _getListData(context, index) {
    return ListTile(
        leading: Image.network(listData[index]["imageUrl"]),
        title: Text(listData[index]["title"]),
        subtitle: Text(listData[index]["author"]),
    );
  }

  //模拟静态列表数据
  @override
  Widget build(BuildContext context) {
    return ListView.builder(
      itemCount: listData.length, //指定长度
      itemBuilder:this._getListData,
    );
  }
}

# 布局系统

# GridView(网格布局)

商品 类表 网格布局

GridView.count GridView.builder

Test

import 'package:flutter/material.dart'; //引入UI库

void main() {
  runApp(MyApp());
}

//自定义组件
class MyApp extends StatelessWidget {
  @override
  Widget build(BuildContext context) {
    return MaterialApp(
      home: Scaffold(
        appBar: AppBar(
          title: Text('Flutter Demo'),
        ),
        body: LayoutDemo(),
      ),
      theme: ThemeData(primarySwatch: Colors.yellow),
    );
  } //无状态组件

}

class LayoutDemo extends StatelessWidget {
  List<Widget> _getListData() {
    List<Widget> list = new List();//生成内容
    //生成容器组件
    for (var i = 0; i < 30; i++) {
      list.add(Container(
        alignment: Alignment.center,
        child: Text(
          '这是第$i条数据',
          style: TextStyle(color: Colors.white, fontSize: 20),
        ),
        color: Colors.pink,
        //改变高度
      ));
    }
    return list;
  }

  @override
  Widget build(BuildContext context) {
    return GridView.count(  //使用该布局
      
      crossAxisSpacing: 20.0, //网格的边距
      mainAxisSpacing: 20.0, //垂直边距

      padding: EdgeInsets.all(10), //距离·外部容器的位置

      crossAxisCount: 2, //一行显示几列

      children: this._getListData(), //网格内容

      childAspectRatio: 0.7, //宽度和高度比例

    );
  }
}

GridView.count

import 'package:flutter/material.dart'; //引入UI库
import './res/listData.dart';  //引入数据

void main() {
  runApp(MyApp());
}

//自定义组件
class MyApp extends StatelessWidget {
  @override
  Widget build(BuildContext context) {
    return MaterialApp(
      home: Scaffold(
        appBar: AppBar(
          title: Text('Flutter Demo'),
        ),
        body: LayoutDemo(),
      ),
      theme: ThemeData(primarySwatch: Colors.yellow),
    );
  } //无状态组件

}

//创建布局组件
class LayoutDemo extends StatelessWidget {
  List<Widget> _getListData() {
    var tempList = listData.map((value) {
      return Container(
        child: Column(
          children: <Widget>[
            Image.network(value['imageUrl']),
            SizedBox(height: 10), //间距
            Text(
              value["title"],
              textAlign: TextAlign.center,
              style: TextStyle(fontSize: 20),
            ),
          ],
        ),
        decoration: BoxDecoration( 
            border: Border.all(
          color: Color.fromRGBO(233, 233, 233, 0.9),
          width: 1,
        )),
      );
    });
    return tempList.toList();
  }
    
    
    

  @override
  Widget build(BuildContext context) {
    return GridView.count(
      crossAxisSpacing: 10.0, //水平边距
      mainAxisSpacing: 10.0, //垂直边距

      padding: EdgeInsets.all(10),

      crossAxisCount: 2, //一行显示几列

      children: this._getListData(), //引入布局组件

      // childAspectRatio: 0.7, //宽度和高度比例
    );
  }
}

GridView.builder

import 'package:flutter/material.dart'; //引入UI库
import './res/listData.dart';

void main() {
  runApp(MyApp());
}

//自定义组件
class MyApp extends StatelessWidget {
  @override
  Widget build(BuildContext context) {
    return MaterialApp(
      home: Scaffold(
        appBar: AppBar(
          title: Text('Flutter Demo'),
        ),
        body: LayoutDemo(),
      ),
      theme: ThemeData(primarySwatch: Colors.yellow),
    );
  } //无状态组件

}

//
class LayoutDemo extends StatelessWidget {

  Widget _getListData(context,index) {
      return Container(
        child: Column( //垂直布局
          children: <Widget>[
            Image.network(listData[index]['imageUrl']),
            SizedBox(height: 10), //间距
            Text(
              listData[index]["title"],
              textAlign: TextAlign.center,
              style: TextStyle(fontSize: 20),
            ),
          ],
        ),
        decoration: BoxDecoration(
          border: Border.all(
          color: Color.fromRGBO(233, 233, 233, 0.9),
          width: 1,
        )),
      );
  }

  @override
  Widget build(BuildContext context) {
    return GridView.builder(
	  //引入 样式
      gridDelegate: SliverGridDelegateWithFixedCrossAxisCount(
        crossAxisSpacing: 10.0, //水平边距
        mainAxisSpacing: 10.0, //垂直边距
        crossAxisCount: 2, //一行显示几列
      ),
      itemCount: listData.length,
      itemBuilder: this._getListData  //这里需要返回类型
    );
  }
}

# RowWidge 横向布局

import 'package:flutter/material.dart';

void main() => runApp(MyApp());

class MyApp extends StatelessWidget {
  // const MyApp({Key key}) : super(key: key);


  @override
    Widget build(BuildContext context) {
      return MaterialApp(
        title: 'Row Wiget Demo',
        home: Scaffold(
          appBar: new AppBar(
            title:new Text('水平方向布局'),
          ),
          body: new Row(
            children: <Widget>[
              new RaisedButton(onPressed: (){},
                color:  Colors.redAccent,
                child: new Text('RedButton'),
              ),
              Expanded( // 自动分配当前  填充满 一列
                child: new RaisedButton(onPressed: (){},
                  color:  Colors.orangeAccent,
                  child: new Text('orangeButton'),
                )
              ),
             
              new RaisedButton(onPressed: (){},
                color:  Colors.blueAccent,
                child: new Text('blueButton'),
              )
            ],
          ),
        ),
      );
    }
  }

# ColumnWidge 垂直 布局

import 'package:flutter/material.dart';

void main() => runApp(MyApp());

class MyApp extends StatelessWidget {
  // const MyApp({Key key}) : super(key: key);


  @override
    Widget build(BuildContext context) {
      return MaterialApp(
        title: 'Row Wiget Demo',
        home: Scaffold(
          appBar: new AppBar(
            title:new Text('垂直方向布局'),
          ),
          body: Center( //添加 center  正中间
              child: new Column(// 水平方向  
              crossAxisAlignment: CrossAxisAlignment.center, // end center/ 左中右
              mainAxisAlignment: MainAxisAlignment.center,
              children: <Widget>[
                new Text("I am Kiven"),
                Expanded(
                  child: new Text("I am Kiven")
                ),
                new Text("I am Kiven"),
              ],
            ),
          )  
        ),
      );
    }
  }

# Stack widget 层叠 布局

import 'package:flutter/material.dart';

void main() => runApp(MyApp());

class MyApp extends StatelessWidget {
  // const MyApp({Key key}) : super(key: key);

  @override
  Widget build(BuildContext context) { //1
    //编写组件样式
    var stack = new Stack(  //3
      //设置偏移量
      alignment: const FractionalOffset(0.5, 1),//0~1  //x  y

      children: <Widget>[
        new CircleAvatar(		// 添加圆形组件
          backgroundImage: new NetworkImage('https://gitee.com/master0037/publicImg/raw/master/small_6.png'), //设置网络图片
          radius: 100.0,
        ),
        new Container(
          decoration: new BoxDecoration( //添加盒子
            color:Colors.lightBlueAccent
          ),
          padding: EdgeInsets.all(5.0),
          child: Text('Kiven'),
        )
      ],
    );

    return MaterialApp(  //2
      title: 'Row Wiget Demo',
      home: Scaffold(
          appBar: new AppBar(
            title: new Text('垂直方向布局'),
          ),
          body: Center(
            //添加 center  正中间
            child: stack
          )),
    );
  }
}

# Positioned Widget 布局 方式


import 'package:flutter/material.dart';

void main() => runApp(MyApp());

class MyApp extends StatelessWidget {
  // const MyApp({Key key}) : super(key: key);

  @override
  Widget build(BuildContext context) {
    //编写组件样式
    var stack = new Stack(
      //设置偏移量
      alignment: const FractionalOffset(0.5, 1),//0~1  //x  y

      children: <Widget>[
        new CircleAvatar( 
          backgroundImage: new NetworkImage('https://gitee.com/master0037/publicImg/raw/master/small_6.png'),
          radius: 100.0,
        ),
        new Positioned(//------------------  新增代码 
          top: 10.0,
          left: 10.0,
          child: Text('Kiven.com'),
        
        ),
        new Positioned(
          bottom: 10.0,
          right: 10.0,
          child: Text(':)'),
        )
      ],
    );

    return MaterialApp(
      title: 'Row Wiget Demo',
      home: Scaffold(
          appBar: new AppBar(
            title: new Text('垂直方向布局'),
          ),
          body: Center(
            //添加 center  正中间
            child: stack
          )),
    );
  }
}

# CardWiget 卡片式布局

import 'package:flutter/material.dart';

void main() => runApp(MyApp());

class MyApp extends StatelessWidget {
  // const MyApp({Key key}) : super(key: key);

  @override
  Widget build(BuildContext context) { 
    //编写组件样式
    var card = new Card( //2
      child: Column( //3
        children: <Widget>[//4
          ListTile(
            title:Text('Kiven.com',style: TextStyle(fontWeight: FontWeight.w800)),
            subtitle: Text('12312312'),
            leading:new Icon(Icons.account_box,color: Colors.lightBlue)
          ),
          new Divider(),//添加分割线
          ListTile(
            title:Text('Kiven.com',style: TextStyle(fontWeight: FontWeight.w800)),
            subtitle: Text('12312312'),
            leading:new Icon(Icons.account_box,color: Colors.lightBlue)
          ),
          new Divider(),//添加分割线
          ListTile(//添加主标题
            title:Text('Kiven.com',style: TextStyle(fontWeight: FontWeight.w800)),
            subtitle: Text('12312312'), //添加副标题
            //  添加 图标 
            leading:new Icon(Icons.account_box,color: Colors.lightBlue)
          ),
          new Divider(color:Colors.black12),//添加分割线
        ],
      ),
    );


    return MaterialApp(  //1
      title: 'Row Wiget Demo',
      home: Scaffold(
          appBar: new AppBar(
            title: new Text('垂直方向布局'),
          ),
          body: Center(
            //添加 center  正中间
            child: card 
          )),
    );
  }
}

# 页面布局 Padding Row Column Expanded

# Padding

Flutter 中很多 Widget 是没有 padding 属 性。

这个时候我们可以用 Padding 组件处理容器与子元素直接的间距。

属性 说明
padding padding 值,EdgeInsetss 设置填充的值
child 子组件
import 'package:flutter/material.dart'; //引入UI库

void main() {
  runApp(MyApp());
}

//自定义组件
class MyApp extends StatelessWidget {
  @override
  Widget build(BuildContext context) {
    return MaterialApp(
      home: Scaffold(
        appBar: AppBar(
          title: Text('Flutter Demo'),
        ),
        body: HomeContent(),
      ),
    );
  } //无状态组件

}

//
class HomeContent extends StatelessWidget {
  @override
  Widget build(BuildContext context) {
    return Padding(
      padding: EdgeInsets.fromLTRB(0, 0, 10, 0),
      child: GridView.count(
      crossAxisCount: 2,
      childAspectRatio: 1.7,//修改宽高避免变形
      children: <Widget>[
        Padding(
          padding: EdgeInsets.fromLTRB(10, 10, 0, 0), //子类padding right 不可用 在外层padding添加
          child: Image.network("https://gitee.com/master0037/publicImg/raw/master/001.jpg",fit: BoxFit.cover),//填充容器
        ),
        Padding(
          padding: EdgeInsets.fromLTRB(10, 10, 0, 0),
          child: Image.network("https://gitee.com/master0037/publicImg/raw/master/001.jpg",fit: BoxFit.cover),//填充容器
        ),
        Padding(
          padding: EdgeInsets.fromLTRB(10, 10, 0, 0),
          child: Image.network("https://gitee.com/master0037/publicImg/raw/master/001.jpg",fit: BoxFit.cover),//填充容器
        ),
        Padding(
          padding: EdgeInsets.fromLTRB(10, 10, 0, 0),
          child: Image.network("https://gitee.com/master0037/publicImg/raw/master/001.jpg",fit: BoxFit.cover),//填充容器
        ),
        Padding(
          padding: EdgeInsets.fromLTRB(10, 10, 0, 0),
          child: Image.network("https://gitee.com/master0037/publicImg/raw/master/001.jpg",fit: BoxFit.cover),//填充容器
        ),
        Padding(
          padding: EdgeInsets.fromLTRB(10, 10, 0, 0),
          child: Image.network("https://gitee.com/master0037/publicImg/raw/master/001.jpg",fit: BoxFit.cover),//填充容器
        ),
        Padding(
          padding: EdgeInsets.fromLTRB(10, 10, 0, 0),

# 页面布局 Stack Align Stack/Positioned

Alignment(x,y)  取值 0.1 ~ 1
1

# Stack

属性 说明
alignment 配置所有子元素的显示位置
children 子组件

统一样式修改

import 'package:flutter/material.dart';

void main() => runApp(MyApp());

class MyApp extends StatelessWidget {
  @override
  Widget build(BuildContext context) {
    // TODO: implement build
    return MaterialApp(
        home: Scaffold(
      appBar: AppBar(title: Text('FlutterDemo')),
      body: LayoutDemo(),
    ));
  }
}

class LayoutDemo extends StatelessWidget {
  @override
  Widget build(BuildContext context) {
    return Center(
      child: Stack(
        alignment: Alignment(0,0),//表示让里面所有内容都居中
      children: <Widget>[
          Container(
            width: 400,
            height: 300,
            color: Colors.pink,
          ),
          Text("I am  Text",style: TextStyle(
            fontSize: 40,
            color: Colors.white
          ),),
          // Text("I am  Text222"),
        ],
      ),
    );
  }
}

# Stack Align

属性 说明
alignment 配置所有子元素的显示位置
child 子组件

调整单个组件位置

调整单个样式 必须嵌套一个父元素容器

实例一

import 'package:flutter/material.dart';

void main() => runApp(MyApp());

class MyApp extends StatelessWidget {
  @override
  Widget build(BuildContext context) {
    // TODO: implement build
    return MaterialApp(
        home: Scaffold(
      appBar: AppBar(title: Text('FlutterDemo')),
      body: LayoutDemo(),
    ));
  }
}

class LayoutDemo extends StatelessWidget {
  @override
  Widget build(BuildContext context) {
    return Center(
      child: Container(
        height: 400,
        width: 300,
        color: Colors.pink,
        child: Stack(
          // alignment: Alignment.center,
          children: <Widget>[
            Align(
              alignment: Alignment(-1,-1),
              child: Icon(Icons.home,size: 40,color: Colors.white),
            ),
            Align(
              alignment: Alignment(0,0),
              child: Icon(Icons.search,size: 30,color: Colors.blue),

            ),
            Align(
              alignment: Alignment(1,1),
              child: Icon(Icons.send,size: 60,color: Colors.orange),
            ),
            
            
          ],
        ),
      ),
     
    );
  }
}

# StackPositioned

Stack 组件中结合 Positioned 组件也可以控制每个子元素的显示位置

实例二

import 'package:flutter/material.dart';

void main() => runApp(MyApp());

class MyApp extends StatelessWidget {
  @override
  Widget build(BuildContext context) {
    // TODO: implement build
    return MaterialApp(
        home: Scaffold(
      appBar: AppBar(title: Text('FlutterDemo')),
      body: LayoutDemo(),
    ));
  }
}

class LayoutDemo extends StatelessWidget {
  @override
  Widget build(BuildContext context) {
    return Center(
      child: Container(
        height: 400,
        width: 300,
        color: Colors.pink,
        child: Stack(
          // alignment: Alignment.center,
          children: <Widget>[
            Positioned(
              left: 10,
              child: Icon(Icons.home,size: 40,color: Colors.white),
            ),
            Positioned(
              bottom:0,
              left: 100,
              child: Icon(Icons.search,size: 30,color: Colors.blue),

            ),
            Positioned(
              right: 0,
              child: Icon(Icons.send,size: 60,color: Colors.orange),
            ),
            
            
          ],
        ),
      ),
     
    );
  }
}

# AspectRatio、Card

# AspectRatio

AspectRatio 的作用是根据设置调整子元素 child 的宽高比。

AspectRatio 首先会在布局限制条件允许的范围内尽可能的扩展，widget 的高度是由宽 度和比率决定的，类似于 BoxFit 中的 contain，按照固定比率去尽量占满区域。

如果在满足所有限制条件过后无法找到一个可行的尺寸，AspectRatio 最终将会去优先 适应布局限制条件，而忽略所设置的比率。

属性 说明
aspectRatio 宽高比，最终可能不会根据这个值去布局， 具体则要看综合因素，外层是否允许按照这 种比率进行布局，这只是一个参考值
child 子组件
import 'package:flutter/material.dart';

void main() => runApp(MyApp());

class MyApp extends StatelessWidget {
  @override
  Widget build(BuildContext context) {
    // TODO: implement build
    return MaterialApp(
        home: Scaffold(
      appBar: AppBar(title: Text('FlutterDemo')),
      body: LayoutDemo(),
    ));
  }
}

class LayoutDemo extends StatelessWidget {
  @override
  Widget build(BuildContext context) {
    return AspectRatio( 
      aspectRatio: 2.0 / 1.0,//相对最外层Container 铺满比例
      child: Container(
        color: Colors.pink,
      ),
    );
  }
}

Json数据渲染

import 'package:flutter/material.dart';
import 'res/listData.dart';

void main() => runApp(MyApp());

class MyApp extends StatelessWidget {
  @override
  Widget build(BuildContext context) {
    // TODO: implement build
    return MaterialApp(
        home: Scaffold(
      appBar: AppBar(title: Text('FlutterDemo')),
      body: LayoutDemo(),
    ));
  }
}

class LayoutDemo extends StatelessWidget {
  @override
  Widget build(BuildContext context) {
    return ListView(
      // 使用 map 遍历数组中数据
      children: listData.map((value) {
          
        return Card(
          margin: EdgeInsets.all(10), //上下边距
          child: Column(
            children: <Widget>[
              AspectRatio(	//宽高比率
                aspectRatio: 20 / 9,
                child: Image.network(
                  value["imageUrl"],
                  fit: BoxFit.cover,
                ),
              ),
                
              ListTile(
                leading: CircleAvatar(
                    backgroundImage: NetworkImage(
                        value["imageUrl"])),
                title: Text(value["title"]),
                subtitle: Text(value["subtitle"],maxLines: 1,overflow: TextOverflow.ellipsis),
              )
            ],
          ),
        );

      }).toList(),

    );
  }
}

# Wrap widegt 布局

# RaisedButton 定义一个按钮

returnRaisedButton(

4
5

Wrap 可以实现流布局，单行的 Wrap 跟 Row 表现几乎一致，单列的 Wrap 则跟 Row 表 现几乎一致。

但 Row 与 Column 都是单行单列的，Wrap 则突破了这个限制，

mainAxis 上空 间不足时，则向 crossAxis 上去扩展显示。

属性 说明
direction 主轴的方向，默认水平
alignment 主轴的对其方式
spacing 主轴方向上的间距
textDirection 文本方向
verticalDirection 定义了 children 摆放顺序，默认是 down，见 Flex 相关属性介绍
runAlignment run 的对齐方式。run 可以理解为新的行或者 列，如果是水平方向布局的话， run 可以理解 为新的一行
runSpacing run 的间距
import 'package:flutter/material.dart';
import 'res/listData.dart';

void main() => runApp(MyApp());

class MyApp extends StatelessWidget {
  @override
  Widget build(BuildContext context) {
    // TODO: implement build
    return MaterialApp(
        home: Scaffold(
      appBar: AppBar(title: Text('FlutterDemo')),
      body: LayoutDemo(),
    ));
  }
}

class LayoutDemo extends StatelessWidget {
  @override
  Widget build(BuildContext context) {
    // TODO: implement build
    return Container(
        
      height: 600,
      width: 400,
      color: Colors.pink,
      padding: EdgeInsets.all(10),
        
      child: Wrap(
          
        spacing: 10,//元素之间的距离
        runSpacing: 10,//元素垂直之间距离
        direction: Axis.vertical,//纵轴显示方式
        // alignment: WrapAlignment.spaceAround,
        runAlignment: WrapAlignment.center,//容器垂直布局
          
        children: <Widget>[
          MyButton("第一季"),
          MyButton("第二季"),
          MyButton("第三季"),
          MyButton("第四季"),
          MyButton("第⑤季"),
          MyButton("第六季"),
          MyButton("第⑦季"),
          MyButton("第⑦季"),
          MyButton("第⑦季"),
        ],
      ),
    );
  }
}

class MyButton extends StatelessWidget {
  final String text;
  const MyButton(this.text, {Key key}) : super(key: key);
  @override
  Widget build(BuildContext context) {
    // TODO: implement build
    return RaisedButton(
      child: Text(this.text),
      textColor: Theme.of(context).accentColor,
      onPressed: () {},
    );
  }
}

# Flutter 路由

# 父子间路由跳转

import 'package:flutter/material.dart';

void main() {
  runApp(MaterialApp(title: "导航演示01", home: new FirstScreen()));//1
}

class FirstScreen extends StatelessWidget {//2
  // const FirstScreen({Key key}) : super(key: key);

  @override
  Widget build(BuildContext context) {
    return Scaffold(
      appBar: AppBar(
        title: Text('导航页面'),
      ),
      body: Center(
        child: RaisedButton(
          child: Text('查看商品详情'),
          onPressed: () {// 点击
            Navigator.push(context, // -------------  主要进行代码   路由跳转新页
                MaterialPageRoute(builder: (context) => new SecondScreen()));
          },
        ),
      ),
    );
  }
}

class SecondScreen extends StatelessWidget {//3  
  @override
  Widget build(BuildContext context) {
    return Scaffold(
      appBar: AppBar(title: Text('商品详情页')),
      body: Center(
        child: RaisedButton(  // 凸起按钮   //4
          child: Text('返回'),
          onPressed: () {     // 按下动作响应事件
            Navigator.pop(context);  //自动返回上一页//5
          },
        ),
      ),
    );
  }
}

# 路由导航 传递参数

import 'package:flutter/material.dart';

//商品列表  虚拟商品数据

class Product {
  //1
  //创建参数常量
  final String title; //商品标题
  final String description; //商品描述
  Product(this.title, this.description);
}

void main() {
  //2
  runApp(MaterialApp(
    title: '导航数据传递与接收',
    home: ProductList(
        //3
        // 创建需要传递参数
        // 渲染
        products: List.generate(
            //4
            20,//渲染未传递两个参数    第一个参数  title    第二个 description
            (index) => Product('商品 $index', '这是一个商品详情，编号 $index'))),
  ));
}

class ProductList extends StatelessWidget {
  //5
  final List<Product> products; //创建接收 常量参数

  //接收参数      构造函数接收参数

  ProductList({Key key, @required this.products}) : super(key: key);//6

  @override
  Widget build(BuildContext context) {  
    return Scaffold(
      appBar: AppBar(
        title: Text('商品列表'),
      ),

      ///动态构建
      body: ListView.builder(//7
        itemCount: products.length,
        itemBuilder: (context, index) {
          return ListTile(
            //添加 商品 索引传参
            title: Text(products[index].title),
            onTap: () { //8
              Navigator.push(//9
                  context,
                  MaterialPageRoute(
                      // 匿名函数 创建 并接收参数
                      builder: (context) =>
                          ProductDetail(product: products[index])));
            }, //添加点击响应事件
          );
        },
      ),
    );
  }
}

class ProductDetail extends StatelessWidget {//1
  //创建常量 接收 传递的参数
  final Product product;//2
  // 构造函数  接收 必须传递的参数
  const ProductDetail({Key key, @required this.product}) : super(key: key);

  @override
  Widget build(BuildContext context) {
    return Scaffold(//3
      appBar: AppBar(
        //接收传递参数
        title: Text('${product.title}'),//4
      ),
      body: Center(
        child: Text('${product.description}'),//5
      ),
    );
  }
}

# 页面跳转并返回数据

异步请求和等待

import 'package:flutter/material.dart';

void main() { // -------- 1  创建入口页
  runApp(MaterialApp(
    title: '页面跳转并返回数据',
    home: FirstPage(),
  ));
}

class FirstPage extends StatelessWidget { // 2   
  const FirstPage({Key key}) : super(key: key);

  @override
  Widget build(BuildContext context) {
    return Scaffold(
      appBar: AppBar(title: Text('获取数据并跳转')),
      body: Center(    //----------   2    编写 入口跳转
        child: RouteButton(),  
      ),
    );
  }
}

class RouteButton extends StatelessWidget { //----------  3  // 入口跳转  等待传递数据
  const RouteButton({Key key}) : super(key: key);

  @override
  Widget build(BuildContext context) {
    return RaisedButton(
      onPressed: () {    // 当点击时 异步获取传递数据
        _navigateToData(context); // 传递上下文
      },
      child: Text('导航数据'),
    );
  }

  _navigateToData(BuildContext context) async {  // ----4 重要代码 传递上下文对象
    // 异步 等待并执行 页面     获取数据并跳转  
    final result = await Navigator.push(
        context, MaterialPageRoute(builder: (context) => Data()));
     //当传递数据 时 下方展示 返回数据源
     Scaffold.of(context).showSnackBar(SnackBar(content: Text('$result')));
  }
}

//  注册数据类  按钮传递数据源
class Data extends StatelessWidget {  //---------- 5   编写 按钮传递数据源
  const Data({Key key}) : super(key: key);

  @override
  Widget build(BuildContext context) {
    return Scaffold(
        appBar: AppBar(title: Text('数据源')),
        body: Center(
          child: Column(
            children: <Widget>[
              RaisedButton(
                child: Text('数据源一'),
                onPressed: () {
                  Navigator.pop(context, '数据源  1314');
                },
              ),
              RaisedButton(
                child: Text('数据源二'),
                onPressed: () {
                  Navigator.pop(context, '数据源  520');
                },
              ),
              RaisedButton(
                child: Text('数据源三'),
                onPressed: () {
                  Navigator.pop(context, '小萝莉  520');
                },
              ),
            ],
          ),
        ));
  }
}

在 Flutter 中通过 Navigator 组件管理路由导航。 并提供了管理堆栈的方法。如：Navigator.push 和 Navigator.pop

Flutter 中给我们提供了两种配置路由跳转的方式：1、基本路由 2、命名路由

# Flutter 中的基本路由使用

跳转 搜索页面

import 'package:flutter/material.dart';
import '../Search.dart';  //引入组件

class HomePage extends StatefulWidget {
  HomePage({Key key}) : super(key: key);

  @override
  _HomePageState createState() => _HomePageState();
}

class _HomePageState extends State<HomePage> {
  @override
  Widget build(BuildContext context) {
    return Column(
      crossAxisAlignment: CrossAxisAlignment.start,
      mainAxisAlignment: MainAxisAlignment.center,
      children: <Widget>[
        RaisedButton(//自定义按钮 			--- 1
            child: Text("跳转到搜索页面"),
            onPressed: () {				   // --- 添加点击事件 
              //路由跳转
              Navigator.of(context).push(	// --- 传入参数跳转
                MaterialPageRoute(
                  builder: (context)=>SearchPage()  // --- 跳转搜索组件
                )
              );
            },
            color: Theme.of(context).accentColor,
            textTheme: ButtonTextTheme.primary),
        SizedBox(height: 20),
      ],
    );
  }
}

import 'package:flutter/material.dart';
import '../Foram.dart';

class CategoryPage extends StatefulWidget {
  CategoryPage({Key key}) : super(key: key);

  @override
  _CategoryPageState createState() => _CategoryPageState();
}

class _CategoryPageState extends State<CategoryPage> {
  @override
  Widget build(BuildContext context) {
    return Column(
      crossAxisAlignment: CrossAxisAlignment.start,
      mainAxisAlignment: MainAxisAlignment.center,
      children: <Widget>[
        RaisedButton(						----  定义跳转按钮
            child: Text("跳转到表单页面并传值"),
            onPressed: () { 				---- 按压事件
              Navigator.of(context)			---- 跳转								传递内容
                  .push(MaterialPageRoute(builder: (context) => FormPage(title:'跳转传值')));
            },
            color: Theme.of(context).accentColor,
            textTheme: ButtonTextTheme.primary),
      ],
    );
  }
}

import 'package:flutter/material.dart';

class FormPage extends StatelessWidget {
  String title; //默认跳转
  FormPage({this.title = "表单"});//定义未传递的默认值

  @override
  Widget build(BuildContext context) {
    return Scaffold(
      floatingActionButton: FloatingActionButton(
        child: Text('返回'),		
        onPressed: () {			// 返回 后退 按钮
          Navigator.of(context).pop();
        },
      ),
      appBar: AppBar(
        title: Text(this.title),   //传递的参数值
      ),
      body: ListView(
        children: <Widget>[
          ListTile(
            title: Text('我是表单页面'),
          )
        ],
      ),
    );
  }
}

class MyApp extends StatelessWidget {
  @override
  Widget build(BuildContext context) {
    // TODO: implement build
    return MaterialApp(//定义命名路由
      home: Tabs(),
      routes: {//添加路由器
        '/form':(context)=>FormPage(), //命名路由
        '/search':(context)=>SearchPage(),

命名路由传参

import 'package:flutter/material.dart';

import 'pages/Foram.dart';
import 'pages/Search.dart';
import 'pages/Tabs.dart';

void main() => runApp(MyApp());

class MyApp extends StatelessWidget {
  final routes = {
    '/form': (context,{arguments}) => FormPage(arguments:arguments),
    '/search': (context,{arguments}) => SearchPage(arguments:arguments),
  };

  @override
  Widget build(BuildContext context) {
    // TODO: implement build
    return MaterialApp(
      //定义命名路由
      home: Tabs(),
      //重要代码
      onGenerateRoute: (RouteSettings settings) {
        //统一处理
        final String name = settings.name;      // 切换路由的时候 先获取名称
        final Function pageContentBuider = this.routes[name];  //
        if (pageContentBuider != null) {

          if (settings != null) {
            final Route route = MaterialPageRoute(
                builder: (context) =>   //进行跳转   并可进行跳转
                    pageContentBuider(context, arguments: settings.arguments));
            return route;
          } else {
            final Route route = MaterialPageRoute(
              builder: (context) =>
                    pageContentBuider(context));
              return route;
          }
        }
 
      },
    );
  }
}

# 抽离Routes 流程化开发

抽离routes组件

lib/routers/Routes.dart

import 'package:flutter/material.dart';


import '../pages/tabs/Home.dart';
import '../pages/Tabs.dart';
import '../pages/Form.dart';
import '../pages/Search.dart';
import '../pages/Product.dart';
import '../pages/ProductInfo.dart';

//配置路由
final routes={
      
      设置根路由
      '/':(context)=>Tabs(),
      '/form':(context)=>FormPage(),
      '/home':(context)=>HomePage(),
      '/search':(context,{arguments})=>SearchPage(arguments:arguments),
      '/product':(context,{arguments})=>ProductPage(arguments:arguments),
      '/productInfo':(context,{arguments})=>ProductInfoPage(arguments:arguments),
      
};



//固定写法
var onGenerateRoute=(RouteSettings settings) {
      // 统一处理
      final String name = settings.name; 
      final Function pageContentBuilder = routes[name];
      if (pageContentBuilder != null) {
        if (settings.arguments != null) {
          final Route route = MaterialPageRoute(
              builder: (context) =>
                  pageContentBuilder(context, arguments: settings.arguments));
          return route;
        }else{
            final Route route = MaterialPageRoute(
              builder: (context) =>
                  pageContentBuilder(context));
            return route;
        }
      }
};

import 'package:flutter/material.dart';

class ProductPage extends StatefulWidget {

  _ProductPageState createState() => _ProductPageState();

class _ProductPageState extends State<ProductPage> {
  @override
  Widget build(BuildContext context) {
    return Scaffold(
      appBar: AppBar(
        title: Text('商品页面'),

            child: Text("跳转到商品详情"),
            onPressed: () {
              //路由跳转 并传递参数
              Navigator.pushNamed(context, '/productInfo',
                  arguments: {"pid": 45});
            },
          ),
        ],
      ),
    );
  }
}

import 'package:flutter/material.dart';

class ProductInfoPage extends StatefulWidget {
  final Map arguments; //定义接收参数
  ProductInfoPage({Key key,this.arguments}) : super(key: key);  //实例化引用

  _ProductInfoPageState createState() => _ProductInfoPageState(arguments:this.arguments); //传参
}

class _ProductInfoPageState extends State<ProductInfoPage> {
  Map arguments;						//定义 
  _ProductInfoPageState({this.arguments});  //实例化
  
  @override
  Widget build(BuildContext context) {
    return Scaffold(
      appBar: AppBar(
        title: Text('商品详情'),
      ),
      body: Container(   //写入屏幕
        child: Text("pid=${arguments["pid"]}"),
      ),
    );
  }
}

import 'package:flutter/cupertino.dart';

class RegisterFirstPage extends StatelessWidget {

            )
          ],
        ));
  }
}

# 重写 返回指定的根

//引入tabs
import '../Tabs.dart';

    child: Text('确定'),
    onPressed: () {
        // Navigator.pushNamed(context, '/registerSecond');
        //替换返回
        // 改 ————————————————————————————
        Navigator.of(context).pushAndRemoveUntil(//传递参数  第二个索引
            new MaterialPageRoute(builder: (context) => new Tabs(index:2)),

)

修改 lib/pages/Tabs.dart

import 'package:flutter/material.dart';
import 'tabs/Category.dart';
import 'tabs/Home.dart';
import 'tabs/Setting.dart';

class Tabs extends StatefulWidget {  //调用
  //改 1
  final index; //定义索引常量
  Tabs({Key key, this.index = 0}) : super(key: key); //构造函数传入  默认0
  @override
  _TabsState createState() => _TabsState(this.index);//覆盖重写 添加index
}
  //------------

class _TabsState extends State<Tabs> {
  //改 2
  int _currentIndex = 0;
  _TabsState(index){    //当调用 _TabsState  传递 index
    this._currentIndex=index;
  }
  //-------------
  List _pageList = [
    HomePage(),
    CategoryPage(),
    SettingPage(),
  ];

  @override
  Widget build(BuildContext context) {
    return Scaffold(
      //Scaffold 开始抽离
      appBar: AppBar(title: Text('FlutterDemo')),
      body: this._pageList[this._currentIndex], //首页对应数组的下标
      bottomNavigationBar: BottomNavigationBar(
        currentIndex: this._currentIndex,
        onTap: (int index) {
          setState(() {
            //改变状态
            this._currentIndex = index;
          }); //这里主要代码
        },
        iconSize: 35.0, //icon 大小
        fixedColor: Colors.pink, //选中颜色
        type: BottomNavigationBarType.fixed, //配置底部tabs可以有多个按钮

        items: [
          BottomNavigationBarItem(
            icon: Icon(Icons.home),
            title: Text("首页"),
          ),
          BottomNavigationBarItem(
            icon: Icon(Icons.category),
            title: Text("分类"),
          ),
          BottomNavigationBarItem(
            icon: Icon(Icons.settings),
            title: Text("设置"),
          ),
        ],
      ),
    );
  }
}

# StatefulWidget

自定义有状态组件

StatelessWidget 是无状态组件，状态不可变的 widget StatefulWidget 是有状态组件，

持有的状态可能在 widget 生命周期改变。

通俗的讲：如果我 们想改变页面中的数据的话这个时候就需要用到 StatefulWidget

​

statefulw动态 statelessw 静态

//自定义无状态组件基本结构

class LayoutDemo extends StatelessWidget {
  const LayoutDemo({Key key}) : super(key: key);

  @override
  Widget build(BuildContext context) {
    return Container(
      child: Text('你好flutter'),
    );
  }
}

class HomePage extends StatefulWidget {

  _HomePage createState() => _HomePage ();
}

class _HomePage extends State<HomePage> {
  @override
  Widget build(BuildContext context) {

       child: child,

使用有状态组件时间 按钮点击+1

import 'package:flutter/material.dart';
import 'res/listData.dart';

void main() => runApp(MyApp());

class MyApp extends StatelessWidget {
  @override
  Widget build(BuildContext context) {
    // TODO: implement build
    return MaterialApp(
        home: Scaffold(
      appBar: AppBar(title: Text('FlutterDemo')),
      body: HomePage(),
    ));
  }
}

class HomePage extends StatefulWidget {
  HomePage({Key key}) : super(key: key);

  @override
  _HomePage createState() => _HomePage();
}

class _HomePage extends State<HomePage> {
  int counNum = 0;
  @override
  Widget build(BuildContext context) {
    return Column(
      children: <Widget>[
        SizedBox(
          height: 200,
        ),
        Chip(
          label: Text("${this.counNum}"),
        ),
        SizedBox(
          height: 200,
        ),
        RaisedButton(
          child: Text('按钮'),
          onPressed: () {
            setState(() {
              //只有状态组件才有  继承State
              this.counNum++;
            });
          },
        )
      ],
    );
  }
}

import 'package:flutter/material.dart';
import 'res/listData.dart';

void main() => runApp(MyApp());

class MyApp extends StatelessWidget {
  @override
  Widget build(BuildContext context) {
    // TODO: implement build
    return MaterialApp(
        home: Scaffold(
      appBar: AppBar(title: Text('FlutterDemo')),
      body: Homepage(),
    ));
  }
}

class Homepage extends StatefulWidget {
  Homepage({Key key}) : super(key: key);

  @override
  _HomepageState createState() => _HomepageState();
}

class _HomepageState extends State<Homepage> {
  List list = new List();

  @override
  Widget build(BuildContext context) {
    return ListView(
      children: <Widget>[
        Column(
          children: this.list.map((value) {
            return ListTile(
              title: Text(value),  //组件
            );
          }).toList(),
        ),
        SizedBox(height: 20),
        RaisedButton(
          child: Text('按钮'),
          onPressed: () {
            setState(() {
              this.list.add('新增数据1');
              this.list.add('新增数据2');
            });
          },
        )
      ],
    );
  }
}

# BottomNavigationBar

自定义底部导航条 实现页面切换

bottomNavigationBar 是 Scaffold 组件的参数。

BottomNavigationBar 常见的属性

属性名 说明
items List 底部导航 条按钮集合
iconSize icon
currentIndex 默认选中第几个
onTap 选中变化回调函数
fixedColor 选中的颜色
type BottomNavigationBarType.fixed
BottomNavigationBarType.shifting

实现 底部按钮导航点击按钮 切换

import 'package:flutter/material.dart';
import 'res/listData.dart';

void main() => runApp(MyApp());

class MyApp extends StatelessWidget {
  @override
  Widget build(BuildContext context) {
    // TODO: implement build
    return MaterialApp(home: Tabs());
  }
}

class Tabs extends StatefulWidget {
  Tabs({Key key}) : super(key: key);

  @override
  _TabsState createState() => _TabsState();
}

class _TabsState extends State<Tabs> {
  int _currentIndex = 0; //定义初始下标

  @override
  Widget build(BuildContext context) {
    return Scaffold(
      //Scaffold 开始抽离
      appBar: AppBar(title: Text('FlutterDemo')),
      body: Text('tabBar'),
      bottomNavigationBar: BottomNavigationBar(
        currentIndex: this._currentIndex,  //赋值自定义下标索引
        onTap: (int index) { //点击传递下标值 
          setState(() { //绑定下标
            this._currentIndex = index;
          }); //这里主要代码
        },
        items: [
          BottomNavigationBarItem(
            icon: Icon(Icons.home),
            title: Text("首页"),
          ),
          BottomNavigationBarItem(
            icon: Icon(Icons.category),
            title: Text("分类"),
          ),
          BottomNavigationBarItem(
            icon: Icon(Icons.settings),
            title: Text("设置"),
          ),
        ],
      ),
    );
  }
}

pages/bottom_navigation_widget.dart

import 'package:flutter/material.dart';
import 'pages/airplay_screen.dart';
import 'pages/pages_screen.dart';
import 'pages/email_screen.dart';
import 'pages/home_screen.dart';

class BottomNavgationWidget extends StatefulWidget {
  BottomNavgationWidget({Key key}) : super(key: key);

  @override
  _BottomNavgationWidgetState createState() => _BottomNavgationWidgetState();
}

class _BottomNavgationWidgetState extends State<BottomNavgationWidget> {
  int _currenIndex = 0; //定义初始索引值

  List _pageList = [
    //引入dart 页
    HomeScreen(),
    EmailScreen(),
    PagesScreen(),
    AirplayScreen(),
  ];

  @override
  Widget build(BuildContext context) {
    return Scaffold(
      body: this._pageList[this._currenIndex], //设置 默认页
      bottomNavigationBar: BottomNavigationBar(
        currentIndex: this._currenIndex, //默认页赋值
        onTap: (int index) {
          setState(() {
            //改变状态
            this._currenIndex = index;
          });//主要业务逻辑
        },

        iconSize: 35.0,
        fixedColor: Colors.pink,//选中颜色
        type: BottomNavigationBarType.fixed,//底部导航可配置多个按钮

        items: [
          BottomNavigationBarItem(
            icon: Icon(Icons.home),
            title: Text('首页')
          ),
          BottomNavigationBarItem(
            icon: Icon(Icons.airplay),
            title: Text('视频')
          ),
          BottomNavigationBarItem(
            icon: Icon(Icons.email),
            title: Text('邮件')
          ),
          BottomNavigationBarItem(
            icon: Icon(Icons.settings),
            title: Text('设置')
          ),
        ],
      ),
    );
  }
}

# Flutter AppBar

属性 描述
leading 在标题前面显示的一个控件，在首页通常显示应用 的 logo；在其他界面通常显示为返回按钮
title 标题，通常显示为当前界面的标题文字，可以放组件
actions 通常使用 IconButton 来表示，可以放按钮组
bottom 通常放 tabBar，标题下面显示一个 Tab 导航栏
backgroundColor 导航背景颜色
iconTheme 图标样式
textTheme 文字样式
centerTitle 标题是否居中显示

TabBar

lib/pages/AppBarDemoPage.dart

import 'package:flutter/material.dart';

class AppBarDemoPage extends StatelessWidget {
const AppBarDemoPage({Key key}) : super(key: key);

@override
Widget build(BuildContext context) {
  return Scaffold(
    appBar: AppBar(
      centerTitle: true,//表示 无论 IOS 或者 安卓 标题居中
      title: Text('AppBarDemoPage'),
      backgroundColor: Colors.pink, //导航颜色
      leading: IconButton( //添加按钮ICON
        icon: Icon(Icons.menu),  
        onPressed: () {
          print("menu");
        },
      ),
      actions: <Widget>[ //右侧按钮 图标
        IconButton(
          icon: Icon(Icons.search),
          onPressed: () {
            print('search');
          },
        ),
        IconButton(
          icon: Icon(Icons.settings),
          onPressed: () {
            print('settings');
          },
        ),

      ],
    ),
    body: Text('111'),
  );
}
}

# 顶部 TabBar 切换

import 'package:flutter/material.dart';

class CategoryPage extends StatefulWidget {
  CategoryPage({Key key}) : super(key: key);

  @override
  _CategoryPageState createState() => _CategoryPageState();
}

class _CategoryPageState extends State<CategoryPage> {
  @override
  Widget build(BuildContext context) {
    return DefaultTabController( // 这里必须嵌套 DefaultTabController
      length: 4,				// Tab 切换数

      child: Scaffold(			//Scaffold  

        appBar: AppBar(		    //顶部嵌套
          title: Row(
              children: <Widget>[	
                Expanded(			
                  child: TabBar(
                    isScrollable: true, //允许放入多个tab切换                      
                    indicatorColor: Colors.red,  //指示器颜色
                    labelColor: Colors.pink,  //选中
                    unselectedLabelColor: Colors.white,  //未选中
                    indicatorSize: TabBarIndicatorSize.label,//指示器长度变短
                    tabs: <Widget>[
                      Tab(text: "热销"),		//切换项 名称
                      Tab(text: "推介"),
                      Tab(text: "分类"),
                      Tab(text: "个人"),
                    ],
                ), 
              )
            ],
          ),
          backgroundColor: Colors.black,   //设置TabBar 背景色
        ),
        body: TabBarView(				//对应视图 必须与上方tabs数量对应
          children: <Widget>[
            ListView(
              children: <Widget>[
                ListTile(
                  title: Text('第一个Tab')
                )
              ],
            ),
            ListView(
              children: <Widget>[
                ListTile(
                  title: Text('第二个Tab')
                )
              ],
            ),
            ListView(
              children: <Widget>[
                ListTile(
                  title: Text('第三个Tab')
                )
              ],
            ),
            ListView(
              children: <Widget>[
                ListTile(
                  title: Text('第四个Tab')
                )
              ],
            ),
          ],
        ),
      ),
    );
  }
}

# 第二种方法 制作 TabBar 切换 （动态）

TabController 最终可实现 动态数据加载 以及监听事件 生命周期

新建 lib/pages/TabBarController.dart

./routes/Routers.dart 挂载路由

import 'package:flutter/material.dart';
import '../pages/TabBarController.dart';

//配置路由
final routes={
    	//新增
      '/tabBarController':(context)=>TabBarControllerPage()
};

lib/pages/TabBarController.dart

import 'package:flutter/material.dart';
//必须是动态  
class TabBarControllerPage extends StatefulWidget {
  TabBarControllerPage({Key key}) : super(key: key);

  @override
  _TabBarControllerPageState createState() => _TabBarControllerPageState();
}
class _TabBarControllerPageState extends State<TabBarControllerPage>  
    with SingleTickerProviderStateMixin { //第一 with 继承 SingleTickerProviderStateMixin
  //创建
  TabController _tabController;  		  //第二 TabController类型 变量名
  //组件初始化进行赋值

  @override
  void dispose() {							
    //组件销声明周期函数
    // TODO: implement dispose
    super.dispose();
    _tabController.dispose();
  }

  @override
  void initState() {							//组件加载完成周期函数
    //声明周期函数
    super.initState();
    //实例化 初始参数
    _tabController = new TabController(vsync: this, length: 2); //添加 长度 调用指向

    _tabController.addListener(() {
      print(_tabController.index);				// 可添加监听事件
    });
  }

  @override
  Widget build(BuildContext context) {
    return Scaffold(
      appBar: AppBar(
        title: Text('TabBarControllerPageState'),
        bottom: TabBar(
          //实现 Tab切换
          controller: this._tabController,    //这里必须 赋值使用
          tabs: <Widget>[
            Tab(text: '热销'),
            Tab(text: '推介'),
          ],
        ),
      ),
      body: TabBarView(
        //实现 Tab切换
        controller: this._tabController,     //这里必须 赋值使用
        children: <Widget>[
          Center(child: Text("热销")),
          Center(child: Text("推介")),
        ],
      ),
    );
  }
}

# Flutter Drawer

侧边栏 以及 侧边栏内容布局

# Flutter DrawerHeader

自定义格式

import 'package:flutter/material.dart';
import 'tabs/Category.dart';
import 'tabs/Home.dart';
import 'tabs/Setting.dart';

class Tabs extends StatefulWidget {  //调用
  final index; //定义索引常量
  Tabs({Key key, this.index = 0}) : super(key: key); //构造函数传入  默认0

  @override
  _TabsState createState() => _TabsState(this.index);//覆盖重写 添加index
}

class _TabsState extends State<Tabs> {
  int _currentIndex = 0;
  _TabsState(index){    //当调用 _TabsState  传递 index
    this._currentIndex=index;
  }


  List _pageList = [
    HomePage(),
    CategoryPage(),
    SettingPage(),
  ];

  @override
  Widget build(BuildContext context) {
    return Scaffold(
      //Scaffold 开始抽离
      appBar: AppBar(title: Text('FlutterDemo')),
      body: this._pageList[this._currentIndex], //首页对应数组的下标
      bottomNavigationBar: BottomNavigationBar(  -------->   抽屉组件必须在此组件内
        currentIndex: this._currentIndex,
        onTap: (int index) {
          setState(() {
            //改变状态
            this._currentIndex = index;
          }); //这里主要代码
        },
        iconSize: 35.0, //icon 大小
        fixedColor: Colors.pink, //选中颜色
        type: BottomNavigationBarType.fixed, //配置底部tabs可以有多个按钮

        items: [
          BottomNavigationBarItem(
            icon: Icon(Icons.home),
            title: Text("首页"),
          ),
          BottomNavigationBarItem(
            icon: Icon(Icons.category),
            title: Text("分类"),
          ),
          BottomNavigationBarItem(
            icon: Icon(Icons.settings),
            title: Text("设置"),
          ),
        ],
      ),
      //添加抽屉组件     ——————————————————————————————————————> 1 添加抽屉组件
      drawer: Drawer(
        child: Column(
          children: <Widget>[
            Row(	   ——————————————————————————————————————> 2 方便铺满
              children: <Widget>[
                Expanded(							------> 3
                  child: DrawerHeader( //侧边栏头部			
                    child: Text('你好Flutter'),
                    decoration: BoxDecoration(		----> 添加样式
                      // color: Colors.pink
                      image: DecorationImage(
                        image: AssetImage('images/001.jpg'),
                        fit: BoxFit.cover  //配置背景图片
                      ),
                      
                    ),
                  ),
                )
              ],
            ),

            //添加列表  			——————————————————————————————————> 2         
            ListTile(
              leading: CircleAvatar(     	-----> 添加圆形图标
                child: Icon(Icons.home),
              ),
              title: Text('我的空间'),
            ),
            Divider(),			---------------------------------->  下滑线
            ListTile(
              leading: CircleAvatar(		
                child: Icon(Icons.people),
              ),
              title: Text('用户中心'),
            ),
            Divider(),
            ListTile(
              leading: CircleAvatar(
                child: Icon(Icons.settings),
              ),
              title: Text('设置中心'),
            ),
            Divider(),
          ],
        ),
      ),
      endDrawer: Drawer(				------->5  右侧侧边栏
        child: Text('右侧侧边栏'),
      ),

    );
  }
}

# UserAccountsDrawerHeader

配套快速生成 侧边栏 固定格式


  @override
  Widget build(BuildContext context) {
    return Scaffold(
      //Scaffold 开始抽离
      appBar: AppBar(title: Text('FlutterDemo')),
      body: this._pageList[this._currentIndex], //首页对应数组的下标
      bottomNavigationBar: BottomNavigationBar(
        currentIndex: this._currentIndex,
        onTap: (int index) {
          setState(() {
            //改变状态
            this._currentIndex = index;
          }); //这里主要代码
        },
        iconSize: 35.0, //icon 大小
        fixedColor: Colors.pink, //选中颜色
        type: BottomNavigationBarType.fixed, //配置底部tabs可以有多个按钮

        items: [
          BottomNavigationBarItem(
            icon: Icon(Icons.home),
            title: Text("首页"),
          ),
          BottomNavigationBarItem(
            icon: Icon(Icons.category),
            title: Text("分类"),
          ),
          BottomNavigationBarItem(
            icon: Icon(Icons.settings),
            title: Text("设置"),
          ),
        ],
      ),
       
      //添加抽屉组件 ————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————
      drawer: Drawer(
        child: Column(
          children: <Widget>[

            Row(
              children: <Widget>[
                Expanded(//---------------------------  修改主要代码
                  child:UserAccountsDrawerHeader(  //更改 为固定形式
                    accountName: Text('变态先生'),  // name
                    accountEmail: Text("ICO@163.com"),	//邮箱
                    currentAccountPicture: CircleAvatar(		// 圆形头像
                      backgroundImage:AssetImage("images/001.jpg"),
                    ),
                    decoration:BoxDecoration(
                      image:DecorationImage(  //背景图片
                        image: AssetImage("images/001.jpg"),
                        fit: BoxFit.cover
                      ),
                    ),

                    otherAccountsPictures: <Widget>[ //右侧
                      Image.asset('images/001.jpg'),
                    ],
                  )
                )
              ],
            ),

            //添加左侧列表
            ListTile(
              leading: CircleAvatar(
                child: Icon(Icons.home),
              ),
              title: Text('我的空间'),
            ),
            Divider(),
            ListTile(
              leading: CircleAvatar(
                child: Icon(Icons.people),
              ),
              title: Text('用户中心'),
            ),
            Divider(),
            ListTile(
              leading: CircleAvatar(
                child: Icon(Icons.settings),
              ),
              title: Text('设置中心'),
            ),
            Divider(),
          ],
        ),
      ),
      endDrawer: Drawer(
        child: Text('右侧侧边栏'),
      ),

    );
  }
}

import 'package:flutter/material.dart';

class UserPage extends StatelessWidget {
  const UserPage({Key key}) : super(key: key);

  @override
  Widget build(BuildContext context) {
    return Scaffold(
      appBar: AppBar(
        title: Text('用户中心'),
      ),
      body: Text('用户中心')
    );
  }
}

侧边栏文件

import 'package:flutter/material.dart';
import 'tabs/Category.dart';
import 'tabs/Home.dart';
import 'tabs/Setting.dart';

class Tabs extends StatefulWidget {
  //调用
  final index; //定义索引常量
  Tabs({Key key, this.index = 0}) : super(key: key); //构造函数传入  默认0

  @override
  _TabsState createState() => _TabsState(this.index); //覆盖重写 添加index
}

class _TabsState extends State<Tabs> {
  int _currentIndex = 0;
  _TabsState(index) {
    //当调用 _TabsState  传递 index
    this._currentIndex = index;
  }

  List _pageList = [
    HomePage(),
    CategoryPage(),
    SettingPage(),
  ];

  @override
  Widget build(BuildContext context) {
    return Scaffold(
      //Scaffold 开始抽离
      appBar: AppBar(title: Text('FlutterDemo')),
      body: this._pageList[this._currentIndex], //首页对应数组的下标
      bottomNavigationBar: BottomNavigationBar(
        currentIndex: this._currentIndex,
        onTap: (int index) {
          setState(() {
            //改变状态
            this._currentIndex = index;
          }); //这里主要代码
        },
        iconSize: 35.0, //icon 大小
        fixedColor: Colors.pink, //选中颜色
        type: BottomNavigationBarType.fixed, //配置底部tabs可以有多个按钮

        items: [
          BottomNavigationBarItem(
            icon: Icon(Icons.home),
            title: Text("首页"),
          ),
          BottomNavigationBarItem(
            icon: Icon(Icons.category),
            title: Text("分类"),
          ),
          BottomNavigationBarItem(
            icon: Icon(Icons.settings),
            title: Text("设置"),
          ),
        ],
      ),
      //添加抽屉组件
      drawer: Drawer(
        child: Column(
          children: <Widget>[
            Row(
              children: <Widget>[
                Expanded(
                    child: UserAccountsDrawerHeader(
                  accountName: Text('变态先生'),
                  accountEmail: Text("ICO@163.com"),
                  currentAccountPicture: CircleAvatar(
                    backgroundImage: AssetImage("images/001.jpg"),
                  ),
                  decoration: BoxDecoration(
                    image: DecorationImage(
                        image: AssetImage("images/001.jpg"), fit: BoxFit.cover),
                  ),
                  otherAccountsPictures: <Widget>[
                    //右侧
                    Image.asset('images/001.jpg'),
                  ],
                ))
              ],
            ),

            //添加左侧列表
            ListTile(
              leading: CircleAvatar(
                child: Icon(Icons.home),
              ),
              title: Text('我的空间'),
            ),
            Divider(),
            ListTile(
              leading: CircleAvatar(
                child: Icon(Icons.people),
              ),
              title: Text('用户中心'),
              onTap: () {
                Navigator.of(context).pop();//隐藏侧边栏 返回
                Navigator.pushNamed(context, '/user');  ---------->  这执行跳转
              },
            ),
            Divider(),
            ListTile(
              leading: CircleAvatar(
                child: Icon(Icons.settings),
              ),
              title: Text('设置中心'),
            ),
            Divider(),
          ],
        ),
      ),
      endDrawer: Drawer(
        child: Text('右侧侧边栏'),
      ),
    );
  }
}

# 按钮组件 自定义按钮组件

组件 说明
RaisedButton 凸起的按钮，其实就是 Material Design 风格的 Button
FlatButton 扁平化的按钮
OutlineButton 线框按钮
IconButton 图标按钮
ButtonBar 按钮组
FloatingActionButton 浮动按钮

组件属性

属性名称 值类型 属性值
onPressed VoidCallback ，一般接收一个 方法 必填参数，按下按钮时触发的回调，接收一个 方法，传 null 表示按钮禁用，会显示禁用相关 样式
child Widget 文本控件
textColor Color 文本颜色
color Color 按钮的颜色
disabledColor Color 按钮禁用时的颜色
disabledTextColor Color 按钮禁用时的文本颜色
splashColor Color 点击按钮时水波纹的颜色
highlightColor Color 点击（长按）按钮后按钮的颜色
elevation double 阴影的范围，值越大阴影范围越大
padding 内边距
shape 设置按钮的形状

执行代码 Buttons.dart

import 'package:flutter/cupertino.dart';
import 'package:flutter/material.dart';

class ButtonsPage extends StatelessWidget {
  const ButtonsPage({Key key}) : super(key: key);

  @override
  Widget build(BuildContext context) {
    return Scaffold(
      appBar: AppBar(
        title: Text('Buttons'),
        actions: <Widget>[
          IconButton(   ------------------------------  IconButton
            icon: Icon(Icons.settings),
            onPressed: () {},
          )
        ],
      ),
      body: Column(
        mainAxisAlignment: MainAxisAlignment.center, //垂直居中
        children: <Widget>[
          Row(
            mainAxisAlignment: MainAxisAlignment.center, //水平居中
            children: <Widget>[
              RaisedButton(
                child: Text('普通按钮'),
                onPressed: () {},
              ),
              SizedBox(width: 10),
              RaisedButton(
                child: Text('颜色按钮'),
                onPressed: () {},
                color: Colors.blue,
                textColor: Colors.white,
              ),//图标按钮报错
              //  RaisedButton.icon(
              //       icon: Icon(Icons.search),
              //       label: Text('图标按钮'),
              //       color: Colors.blue,
              //       textColor: Colors.white,
              //       // onPressed: null,
              //       onPressed: () {
              //         print("图标按钮");
              //       }),
              SizedBox(width: 10),
              RaisedButton(
                child: Text('阴影按钮'),
                onPressed: () {},
                color: Colors.blue,
                textColor: Colors.white,
                elevation: 10,
              ),
            ],
          ),
          //第二行
          Row(
            mainAxisAlignment: MainAxisAlignment.center, //水平居中
            //设置按钮宽高
            children: <Widget>[
              SizedBox(height: 10),
              RaisedButton(				--------------------------- 圆角按钮
                child: Text('圆角按钮'),
                onPressed: () {},
                color: Colors.blue,
                textColor: Colors.pink,
                shape: RoundedRectangleBorder(//添加形状
                    borderRadius: BorderRadius.circular(10)
                    //添加圆角
                    ),
                elevation: 10,
              ),
              Container(
                height: 80,
                child: RaisedButton(		--------------------------- 圆形按钮
                  child: Text('圆形按钮'),
                  onPressed: () {},
                  color: Colors.blue,
                  splashColor: Colors.green,  ------------------  点击水波纹
                  elevation: 10,					----------  按钮阴影
                  shape: CircleBorder(side: BorderSide(color: Colors.pink)),
                ),
              )
            ],
          ),
          Row(
            mainAxisAlignment: MainAxisAlignment.center, //水平居中
            //设置按钮宽高
            children: <Widget>[
              Container(
                height: 50,
                width: 200,
                child: RaisedButton(
                  child: Text('设置按钮宽高'),
                  onPressed: () {},
                  color: Colors.blue,
                  textColor: Colors.pink,
                  elevation: 10,
                ),
              )
            ],
          ),
          SizedBox(height: 10),

          Row(
            //全屏 按钮
            mainAxisAlignment: MainAxisAlignment.center, //水平居中
            //设置按钮宽高
            children: <Widget>[
              Expanded(				--------    外层包裹 实现 自适应
                child: Container(
                  height: 50,
                  margin: EdgeInsets.all(10),
                  child: RaisedButton(
                    child: Text('自适应按钮'),
                    onPressed: () {},
                    color: Colors.blue,
                    textColor: Colors.white,
                    elevation: 10,
                  ),
                ),
              ),
              //扁平化按钮
              FlatButton(			———————————————————————— 扁平化按钮
                  child: Text('按钮'),
                  onPressed: () {},
                  color: Colors.blue,
                  textColor: Colors.white),
              //边框按钮
              OutlineButton(			————————————————————————  边框按钮
                child: Text("按钮"),
                onPressed: () {},
              )
            ],
          ),
          Row(
            mainAxisAlignment: MainAxisAlignment.center,
            children: <Widget>[
              Expanded(
                //添加自适应
                child: Container(
                  height: 50,
                  child: OutlineButton(
                    child: Text("注册"),
                    onPressed: () {},
                  ),
                ),
              )
            ],
          ),


          Row(
            mainAxisAlignment: MainAxisAlignment.center,///统一修改按钮位置
            children: <Widget>[
              ButtonBar(
                children: <Widget>[
                  RaisedButton(
                    child: Text('登录'),
                    color:Colors.blue,
                    elevation: 10,
                    onPressed: (){},
                  ),
                  RaisedButton(
                    child: Text('注册'),
                    color:Colors.blue,
                    elevation: 10,
                    onPressed: (){},
                  ),
                ],
              ),
              //自定义按钮
              MyButton(text: '自定义按钮',heigt: 30,width:50,pressed: (){
                print('自定义按钮');
              })
            ],
          )

        ],
      ),
    );
  }
}


// 自定义按钮组件
class MyButton extends StatelessWidget {

  final text;
  final pressed;
  final double width;
  final double heigt;
  //传值 必须 double 类型
  const MyButton({this.text='',this.pressed=null,this.width=80.0,this.heigt=30.0});

  @override
  Widget build(BuildContext context) {
    return Container(
      width: this.width,
      height: this.heigt,
      child: RaisedButton(
        child: Text(this.text),
        onPressed: this.pressed ,
      ),
    );
  }
}

        print('FloatingActionButton');
