实现 咸鱼底部切换导航

Tab.dart 执行代码

import 'package:flutter/material.dart';
import 'tabs/Category.dart';
import 'tabs/Home.dart';
import 'tabs/Setting.dart';

class Tabs extends StatefulWidget {
  //调用
  final index; //定义索引常量
  Tabs({Key key, this.index = 0}) : super(key: key); //构造函数传入  默认0

  @override
  _TabsState createState() => _TabsState(this.index); //覆盖重写 添加index
}

class _TabsState extends State<Tabs> {
  int _currentIndex = 0;
  _TabsState(index) {
    //当调用 _TabsState  传递 index
    this._currentIndex = index;
  }

  List _pageList = [
    HomePage(),
    CategoryPage(),
    SettingPage(),
  ];

  @override
  Widget build(BuildContext context) {
    return Scaffold(
      // 修改代码 ————————————————————————————————————————————————————\\\
      //Scaffold 开始抽离
      floatingActionButton: Container(     		------------  外层嵌套容器 实现宽高
        height: 80,
        width: 80,
        // color: Colors.red,
        padding: EdgeInsets.all(8),				
        margin: EdgeInsets.only(top: 15),
        decoration: BoxDecoration(				------------- 添加boder样式
            borderRadius: BorderRadius.circular(40), color: Colors.white),
        child: FloatingActionButton(    				 ------------  这里添加浮动按钮

          child: Icon(Icons.add),				
          onPressed: () {					---- 添加事件
            setState(() {
              this._currentIndex = 1;//切换
            });
          },
          backgroundColor:this._currentIndex==1 ? Colors.pink:Colors.yellow,   //正则实现选中样式
          //添加选中样式

        ),
      ),
      floatingActionButtonLocation: FloatingActionButtonLocation.centerDocked,  添加位置 
        
      // 修改代码 ————————————————————————————————————————————————————\\\
  
      appBar: AppBar(title: Text('FlutterDemo')),
      body: this._pageList[this._currentIndex], //首页对应数组的下标
      bottomNavigationBar: BottomNavigationBar(
        currentIndex: this._currentIndex,
        onTap: (int index) {
          setState(() {
            //改变状态
            this._currentIndex = index;
          }); //这里主要代码
        },
        iconSize: 35.0, //icon 大小
        fixedColor: Colors.pink, //选中颜色
        type: BottomNavigationBarType.fixed, //配置底部tabs可以有多个按钮

        items: [
          BottomNavigationBarItem(
            icon: Icon(Icons.home),
            title: Text("首页"),
          ),
          BottomNavigationBarItem(
            icon: Icon(Icons.category),
            title: Text("分类"),
          ),
          BottomNavigationBarItem(
            icon: Icon(Icons.settings),
            title: Text("设置"),
          ),
        ],
      ),
      //添加抽屉组件
      drawer: Drawer(
        child: Column(
          children: <Widget>[
            Row(
              children: <Widget>[
                Expanded(
                    child: UserAccountsDrawerHeader(
                  accountName: Text('变态先生'),
                  accountEmail: Text("ICO@163.com"),
                  currentAccountPicture: CircleAvatar(
                    backgroundImage: AssetImage("images/001.jpg"),
                  ),
                  decoration: BoxDecoration(
                    image: DecorationImage(
                        image: AssetImage("images/001.jpg"), fit: BoxFit.cover),
                  ),
                  otherAccountsPictures: <Widget>[
                    //右侧
                    Image.asset('images/001.jpg'),
                  ],
                ))
              ],
            ),

            //添加左侧列表
            ListTile(
              leading: CircleAvatar(
                child: Icon(Icons.home),
              ),
              title: Text('我的空间'),
            ),
            Divider(),
            ListTile(
              leading: CircleAvatar(
                child: Icon(Icons.people),
              ),
              title: Text('用户中心'),
              onTap: () {
                Navigator.of(context).pop(); //隐藏
                Navigator.pushNamed(context, '/user');
              },
            ),
            Divider(),
            ListTile(
              leading: CircleAvatar(
                child: Icon(Icons.settings),
              ),
              title: Text('设置中心'),
            ),
            Divider(),
          ],
        ),
      ),
      endDrawer: Drawer(
        child: Text('右侧侧边栏'),
      ),
    );
  }
}

# Flutter 表单

属性 描述
maxLines 设置此参数可以把文本框改为多行文本框
onChanged 文本框改变的时候触发的事件
decoration hintText 类似 html 中的 placeholder border 配置文本框边框 OutlineInputBorder 配合使用 labelText lable 的名称 labelStyle 配置 lable 的样式
obscureText 把文本框框改为密码框
controller controller 结合 TextEditingController()可以配置表单默认显示的内容

# TextField

import 'package:flutter/material.dart';

class TextFieldPage extends StatefulWidget {
  TextFieldPage({Key key}) : super(key: key);

  @override
  _TextFieldPageState createState() => _TextFieldPageState();
}

class _TextFieldPageState extends State<TextFieldPage> {
  var _userName = new TextEditingController();  //初始化给表单赋值   ------------>  如果需要初始化赋值 则需要实例化
  var _password;      //不初始化不需要赋值
  @override
  void initState() {												----------->  声明周期函数  组件初始化完成
    // TODO: implement initState
    super.initState();
    _userName.text = '初始';
  }

  @override
  Widget build(BuildContext context) {
    return Scaffold(
        appBar: AppBar(
          title: Text('TextFieldPage'),
        ),
        body: Padding(
            padding: EdgeInsets.all(20),
            child: Column(
              children: <Widget>[
                TextField(													------------->  添加 文本输入
                  decoration: InputDecoration(hintText: "请输入用户名"),		------------->  添加 提示文字
                  controller: _userName,									---------> 初始化添加
                  onChanged: (value) {
                    setState(() {
                      _userName.text = value; //修改获取值					----->  动态赋值获取  文本框输入内容
                    });
                  },
                ),
                SizedBox(height: 10),
                TextField(													
                  obscureText: true,								-------------------->  开启密码 字符不可见
                  decoration: InputDecoration(hintText: "密码"),
                  onChanged: (value) {
                    setState(() {
                      _password = value; //修改获取值				---------------------->   赋值输入框密码
                    });
                  },
                ),
                SizedBox(height: 20),
                Container(
                  width: double.infinity, //最大宽度				---------------->  赋值最大宽度 注意必须添加double
                  height: 40,
                  child: RaisedButton(						------------>  添加按钮
                    child: Text("登录"),
                    onPressed: () {
                      //获取内容打印
                      print(this._userName.text);
                      print(this._password);
                    },
                    color: Colors.blue,
                    textColor: Colors.white,
                  ),
                )
              ],
            )));
  }
}

//输入框 的样式   抽离组件化
class TextDemo extends StatelessWidget {
  const TextDemo({Key key}) : super(key: key);

  @override
  Widget build(BuildContext context) {
    return Container(
      child: Column(
        children: <Widget>[
          TextField(),
          SizedBox(height: 20), //默认输入框
          TextField(
            decoration: InputDecoration(
                hintText: "请输入....",
                border: OutlineInputBorder(), //带边框先的输入框
                labelText: "用户名"),
          ), //下划线输入框
          SizedBox(height: 20),
          TextField(
            maxLength: 4, //输入不能超出4 个字符
            decoration: InputDecoration(
                hintText: "多行文本框", border: OutlineInputBorder() //带边框先的输入框
                ),
          ), //下划线输入框
          SizedBox(height: 20),
          TextField(
            decoration:
                InputDecoration(icon: Icon(Icons.people), hintText: "请输入用户名"),
          ),
          SizedBox(height: 20),
          TextField(
            obscureText: true, //密码框
            maxLength: 12, //输入不能超出4 个字符
            decoration: InputDecoration(
                hintText: "密码框", border: OutlineInputBorder() //带边框先的输入框
                ),
          ), //下划线输入框
          //下划线输入框
        ],
      ),
    );
  }
}

# Checkbox、 CheckboxListTile

# Checkbox 常见属性

属性 描述
value true 或者 false
onChanged 改变的时候触发的事件
activeColor 选中的颜色、背景颜色
checkColor 选中的颜色、Checkbox 里面对号的颜色

# CheckboxListTile 常见属性

属性 描述
value true 或者 false
onChanged 改变的时候触发的事件
activeColor 选中的颜色、背景颜色
title 标题
subtitle 二级标题
secondary 配置图标或者图片
selected 选中的时候文字颜色是否跟着改变

Checkbox.dart

import 'package:flutter/material.dart';

class CheckBoxPage extends StatefulWidget {
  CheckBoxPage({Key key}) : super(key: key);

  @override
  _CheckBoxPageState createState() => _CheckBoxPageState();
}

class _CheckBoxPageState extends State<CheckBoxPage> {
  var flag = true;										--------  中间变量保持状态


  @override
  Widget build(BuildContext context) {
    return Scaffold(
      appBar: AppBar(
        title: Text('CheckBoxPage'),
      ),
      body: Column(
        mainAxisAlignment: MainAxisAlignment.center,      ------ 水平居中
        children: <Widget>[
          Row(
            children: <Widget>[
              Checkbox(
                value: this.flag,							------  是否选中
                onChanged: (val) {
                  //实现点击改变
                  setState(() {
                    this.flag = val;						------ 动态获取 并赋值
                  });
                },
                activeColor: Colors.red,						------- 选中改变颜色
                  
              )
            ],
          ),
          SizedBox(height: 10),
          Row(
            children: <Widget>[Text(this.flag ? "选中" : "未选中")],			-------- 添加正则
          ),
          //CheckBoxListTile

          SizedBox(height: 10),
          CheckboxListTile(													------  添加复选框列表
            value: this.flag,
            onChanged: (val) {
              setState(() {
                this.flag = val;
              });
            },
            title: Text('标题'),										------  标题
            subtitle: Text('二级标题'),
          ),

          SizedBox(height: 10),
          CheckboxListTile(
            value: this.flag,
            onChanged: (val) {
              setState(() {
                this.flag = val;
              });
            },
            title: Text('标题'),
            subtitle: Text('二级标题'),
            secondary: Icon(Icons.home),							------  添加Icon图标  或 图片
            selected: this.flag,		
          ),

        ],
      ),
    );
  }
}

# Radio、RadioListTile

Radio 常用属性

属性 描述
value 单选的值
onChanged 改变时触发
activeColor 选中的颜色、背景颜色
groupValue 选择组的值

RadioListTile 常用属性

属性 描述
value true 或者 false
onChanged 改变的时候触发的事
activeColor 选中的颜色、背景颜色
title 标题
subtitle 二级标题
secondary 配置图标或者图片
groupValue 选择组的值
import 'package:flutter/material.dart';

class RadioDemo extends StatefulWidget {
  RadioDemo({Key key}) : super(key: key);

  @override
  _RadioDemoState createState() => _RadioDemoState();
}

class _RadioDemoState extends State<RadioDemo> {
  var sex = 1;
  bool flag = true;							---- 定义默认值
  @override
  Widget build(BuildContext context) {
    return Scaffold(
        appBar: AppBar(
          title: Text('RadioDemo'),
        ),
        body: Column(									---------- 添加列
          children: <Widget>[
            Row(										--------- 行
              children: <Widget>[
                Text('男:'),
                Radio(
                  value: 1,								--------- 添加值 不予许重复
                  onChanged: (value) {
                    setState(() {
                      this.sex = value;					----------- 状态赋值
                    });
                  },
                  groupValue: this.sex,					--------  赋值
                ),
                SizedBox(width: 20),
                Text('女:'),
                Radio(
                  value: 2,
                  onChanged: (value) {
                    setState(() {
                      this.sex = value;
                    });
                  },
                  groupValue: this.sex,
                ),
              ],
            ),
            Row(
              children: <Widget>[				
                Text("${this.sex}"),				
                Text("${this.sex == 1 ? '男' : '女'}"),			------------ 添加正则 方便可视化
              ],
            ),
            SizedBox(height: 20),
              
            RadioListTile(							——————————————————————>    单选按钮组
              value: 1,
              onChanged: (val) {
                setState(() {
                  this.sex = val;
                });
              },
              groupValue: this.sex,
                          
              title: Text('Title'),				
              subtitle: Text('subTitle'),
              secondary: Icon(Icons.help),
              selected: this.sex == 1,			-------------------->  默认选择
            ),
            RadioListTile(
              value: 2,
              onChanged: (val) {
                setState(() {
                  this.sex = val;
                });
              },
              groupValue: this.sex,
              title: Text('Title'),
              subtitle: Text('subTitle'),
              secondary: Icon(Icons.help),
              selected: this.sex == 2,
            ),
            SizedBox(height: 11),

            // 开关
            Switch(											--------------->  添加开关
              value: this.flag,								---------> 赋值初始值	
              onChanged: (v) {				
                setState(() {
                  this.flag = v;
                  print(this.flag);
                });
              },
            )
          ],
        ));
  }
}

# 综合实例

import 'package:flutter/material.dart';

class FormDemoPage extends StatefulWidget {
  FormDemoPage({Key key}) : super(key: key);

  _FormDemoPageState createState() => _FormDemoPageState();
}

class _FormDemoPageState extends State<FormDemoPage> {

  String username;
  int sex=1;								
  String info='';						------------- 初始变量赋值

  List hobby=[							----------------> 添加伪数据
    {
      "checked":true,
      "title":"吃饭"
    },
     {
      "checked":false,
      "title":"睡觉"
    },
     {
      "checked":true,
      "title":"写代码"
    }
  ];

  List<Widget> _getHobby(){					----------  设置私有方法
	
    List<Widget> tempList=[];				----------- 定义 Widget 类型 空数组

    for(var i=0;i<this.hobby.length;i++){	--------------- 遍历渲染

        tempList.add(						------ 添加数据
          Row(
            children: <Widget>[
              Text(this.hobby[i]["title"]+":"),		
              Checkbox(
                value: this.hobby[i]["checked"],			-------> 渲染组件
                onChanged: (value){	
                  setState(() {								--------> 动态传值
                    this.hobby[i]["checked"]=value; 
                  });
                }
              )
            ],
          )
        );

    }
    return tempList;

  }

  void _sexChanged(value){
    setState(() {
      this.sex=value; 
    });
  }

  @override
  Widget build(BuildContext context) {
    return Scaffold(
      appBar: AppBar(
        title: Text("学员信息登记系统"),
      ),
      body: Padding(
        padding: EdgeInsets.all(20),
        child: Column(
          children: <Widget>[

             TextField(									------------->  添加 input 输入
               decoration: InputDecoration(
                 hintText: "输入用户信息"					------------ 提示信息
               ),
               onChanged: (value){
                 setState(() {
                    this.username=value;
                 });
               },
             ),
              SizedBox(height:10),
             Row(
               children: <Widget>[
                 Text("男"),
                 Radio(
                   value: 1,
                   onChanged: this._sexChanged,						
                   groupValue: this.sex
                 ),
                 SizedBox(width: 20),
                 Text("女"),
                 Radio(
                   value: 2,
                   onChanged:this._sexChanged,
                   groupValue: this.sex
                 )
               ],
             ),

            //爱好
            SizedBox(height:40),
            Column(
              children: this._getHobby(),
            ),

            TextField(
              maxLines: 4,
               decoration: InputDecoration(
                 hintText: "描述信息",
                 border: OutlineInputBorder()
               ),
               onChanged: (value){
                setState(() {
                  this.info=value;
                });
               },
             ),


           SizedBox(height:40),
             Container(
              width: double.infinity,               ----------->  注意这里添加了 自适应宽度
              height: 40,
              child: RaisedButton(
                child: Text("提交信息"),
                onPressed: (){
                  print(this.sex);
                  print(this.username);
                  print(this.hobby);
                },
                color: Colors.blue,
                textColor: Colors.white,
              ),
            )
          ],
        ),
      ),
    );
  }
}

import 'package:flutter/material.dart';
import 'package:date_format/date_format.dart';
// import 'package:flutter_localizations/flutter_localizations.dart'; 

class DateDemo extends StatefulWidget {
  DateDemo({Key key}) : super(key: key);

  @override
  _DateDemoState createState() => _DateDemoState();
}

class _DateDemoState extends State<DateDemo> {
  DateTime _nowDate = DateTime.now();

  var _nowTime = TimeOfDay(hour: 12, minute: 20);

  _showDatePicker() async {
    //第一种
    // showDatePicker(
    //   context: context,
    //   initialDate: _nowDate, //单签日期
    //   firstDate: DateTime(1980),
    //   lastDate: DateTime(2100),
    // ).then((onValue) {
    //   print(onValue); //输出选择日期
    // });

    //第二种方法    异步获取
    var result = await showDatePicker(
      context: context,
      initialDate: _nowDate, //单签日期
      firstDate: DateTime(1980),
      lastDate: DateTime(2100),
      // locale: Locale('zh'),
    );

    setState(() {
      //动态获取
      this._nowDate = result;
    });
  }

  _showTimePicker() async {
    var result = await showTimePicker(
      context: context,
      initialTime: _nowTime, //初始化
    );

    setState(() {
      this._nowTime = result;
    });
  }

  @override
  void initState() {
    // TODO: implement initState
    super.initState();
    // print(now.millisecondsSinceEpoch); //1591615743911
    //print(DateTime.fromMillisecondsSinceEpoch(1591615743911));
    //转换 格式  2019-06-08   2019 /
  }

  @override
  Widget build(BuildContext context) {
    return Scaffold(
        appBar: AppBar(
          title: Text("DatePicker"),
        ),
        body: Column(
          mainAxisAlignment: MainAxisAlignment.center, //主轴居中
          children: <Widget>[
            Row(
              children: <Widget>[
                //日期选择
                InkWell(
                  // 按钮组件 无样式
                  child: Row(
                    mainAxisAlignment: MainAxisAlignment.center, //主轴居中
                    children: <Widget>[
                      Text("${formatDate(_nowDate, [
                        yyyy,
                        '年',
                        mm,
                        '月',
                        dd
                      ])}"), //日期选择
                      Icon(Icons.arrow_drop_down)
                    ],
                  ),
                  onTap: _showDatePicker, //点击调用
                ),
                // //时间选择
                InkWell(
                  // 按钮组件 无样式
                  child: Row(
                    mainAxisAlignment: MainAxisAlignment.center, //主轴居中
                    children: <Widget>[
                      Text("${_nowTime.format(context)}"),
                      Icon(Icons.arrow_drop_down)
                    ],
                  ),
                  onTap: () {
                    _showTimePicker();
                  },
                ),
              ],
            )
          ],
        ));
  }
}

import 'package:flutter/material.dart';
import 'package:date_format/date_format.dart';
// import 'package:flutter_localizations/flutter_localizations.dart'; 

class DateDemo extends StatefulWidget {
  DateDemo({Key key}) : super(key: key);

  @override
  _DateDemoState createState() => _DateDemoState();
}

class _DateDemoState extends State<DateDemo> {
  DateTime _nowDate = DateTime.now();

  var _nowTime = TimeOfDay(hour: 12, minute: 20);

  _showDatePicker() async {
    //第一种
    // showDatePicker(
    //   context: context,
    //   initialDate: _nowDate, //单签日期
    //   firstDate: DateTime(1980),
    //   lastDate: DateTime(2100),
    // ).then((onValue) {
    //   print(onValue); //输出选择日期
    // });

    //第二种方法    异步获取
    var result = await showDatePicker(
      context: context,
      initialDate: _nowDate, //单签日期
      firstDate: DateTime(1980), 			//开始时间
      lastDate: DateTime(2100),				//结束时间
      // locale: Locale('zh'),
    );

    setState(() {
      //赋值 获取内容
      this._nowDate = result;
    });
  }

  _showTimePicker() async {
    var result = await showTimePicker(
      context: context,
      initialTime: _nowTime, //初始化
    );

    setState(() {
      this._nowTime = result;
    });
  }

  @override
  void initState() {
    // TODO: implement initState
    super.initState();
    // print(now.millisecondsSinceEpoch); //1591615743911
    //print(DateTime.fromMillisecondsSinceEpoch(1591615743911));
    //转换 格式  2019-06-08   2019 /
  }

  @override
  Widget build(BuildContext context) {
    return Scaffold(
        appBar: AppBar(
          title: Text("DatePicker"),
        ),
        body: Column(
          mainAxisAlignment: MainAxisAlignment.center, //主轴居中
          children: <Widget>[
            Row(
              children: <Widget>[
                //日期选择
                InkWell(
                  // 按钮组件 无样式
                  child: Row(		//日历组件
                    mainAxisAlignment: MainAxisAlignment.center, //主轴居中
                    children: <Widget>[
                      Text("${formatDate(_nowDate, [yyyy,'年',mm,'月',dd])}"), //日期选择  
                      Icon(Icons.arrow_drop_down)
                    ],
                  ),
                  onTap: _showDatePicker, //点击调用
                ),
                // //时间选择
                InkWell(    --------------------------  子组件添加 允许被按压 执行事件
                  // 按钮组件 无样式
                  child: Row(
                    mainAxisAlignment: MainAxisAlignment.center, //主轴居中
                    children: <Widget>[
                      Text("${_nowTime.format(context)}"),		// 格式化替换字符串
                      Icon(Icons.arrow_drop_down)
                    ],
                  ),
                  onTap: () {
                    _showTimePicker();
                  },
                ),
              ],
            )
          ],
        ));
  }
}

下方滚动日期组件

import 'package:flutter/material.dart';
import 'package:flutter_cupertino_date_picker/flutter_cupertino_date_picker.dart';
import 'package:date_format/date_format.dart';

class DatePickerDemo extends StatefulWidget {
  DatePickerDemo({Key key}) : super(key: key);

  @override
  _DatePickerDemoState createState() => _DatePickerDemoState();
}

class _DatePickerDemoState extends State<DatePickerDemo> {
  DateTime _dateTime = DateTime.now();

  _showDatePicker() {
    DatePicker.showDatePicker(
      context,
      // onMonthChangeStartWithFirstDate: true,
      pickerTheme: DateTimePickerTheme(
        showTitle: true, //是否显示title
        //底部弹出确定和取消
        confirm: Text('确定', style: TextStyle(color: Colors.red)),
        cancel: Text('取消', style: TextStyle(color: Colors.cyan)),
      ),
      minDateTime: DateTime.parse("1980-05-12"), //起始日期
      maxDateTime: DateTime.parse("2100-05-12"), //终止日期
      initialDateTime: DateTime.now(), //初始时间
      dateFormat: "yyyy-MMMM-dd",				//日期格式
      locale: DateTimePickerLocale.zh_cn, //中文语言

      onClose: () => print("----- onClose -----"),  

      onCancel: () => print('onCancel'),

      // onChange: (dateTime, List<int> index) {
      //   setState(() {
      //     _dateTime = dateTime;
      //   });
      // },
      //确定改变DateTime

      onConfirm: (dateTime, List<int> index) {			//单机确定取消 进行修改赋值
        setState(() {
          _dateTime = dateTime;
        });
      },
    );
//  注意这里多一个大括号

    @override
    Widget build(BuildContext context) {
      // TODO: implement build
      throw UnimplementedError();
    }
  }

  @override
  Widget build(BuildContext context) {
    return Scaffold(
      appBar: AppBar(
        title: Text('日期选择'),
      ),
      body: Column(
        mainAxisAlignment: MainAxisAlignment.center,
        children: <Widget>[
          InkWell(
            child: Row(
              mainAxisAlignment: MainAxisAlignment.center,
              children: <Widget>[
                Text("${formatDate(_dateTime, [yyyy,'年',mm,'月','dd'])}"),
                Icon(Icons.arrow_drop_down)
              ],
            ),
            onTap: _showDatePicker,
          )
        ],
      ),
    );
  }
}

下方 时间日期滚动组件

 import 'package:flutter/material.dart';
import 'package:flutter_cupertino_date_picker/flutter_cupertino_date_picker.dart';
import 'package:date_format/date_format.dart';


class DateTimePickerPage extends StatefulWidget {
  DateTimePickerPage({Key key}) : super(key: key);

  @override
  _DateTimePickerPageState createState() => _DateTimePickerPageState();
}

class _DateTimePickerPageState extends State<DateTimePickerPage> {
DateTime _dateTime = DateTime.now();
  _showDatePicker() {
    DatePicker.showDatePicker(
      context,
      // onMonthChangeStartWithFirstDate: true,
      pickerTheme: DateTimePickerTheme(
        showTitle: true, //是否显示title
        //底部弹出确定和取消
        confirm: Text('确定', style: TextStyle(color: Colors.red)),
        cancel: Text('取消', style: TextStyle(color: Colors.cyan)),
      ),
      minDateTime: DateTime.parse("1980-05-12"), //起始日期
      maxDateTime: DateTime.parse("2100-05-12"), //终止日期
      initialDateTime: DateTime.now(), //初始时间

      //————————————————————————  主要修改代码
      // dateFormat: "yyyy-MMMM-dd",    ----------------------  注释此格式
      locale: DateTimePickerLocale.zh_cn, //中文语言
      
      
      dateFormat: "yyyy年M月d日    EEE,H时:m分",//修改代码    			------- 新增
      pickerMode: DateTimePickerMode.datetime,   //showTimePicker		------- 新增


      //————————————————————————  主要修改代码

      onClose: () => print("----- onClose -----"),

      onCancel: () => print('onCancel'),


      onConfirm: (dateTime, List<int> index) {
        setState(() {
          _dateTime = dateTime;
        });
      },
    );

    @override
    Widget build(BuildContext context) {
      // TODO: implement build
      throw UnimplementedError();
    }
  }

  @override
  Widget build(BuildContext context) {
    return Scaffold(
      appBar: AppBar(
        title: Text('日期选择'),
      ),
      body: Column(
        mainAxisAlignment: MainAxisAlignment.center,
        children: <Widget>[
          InkWell(
            child: Row(
              mainAxisAlignment: MainAxisAlignment.center,
              children: <Widget>[			-------  新增  时间 日期 格式       ↓
                Text("${formatDate(_dateTime, [yyyy,'年',mm,'月',dd,' ',HH,':',nn])}"),
                Icon(Icons.arrow_drop_down)
              ],
            ),
            onTap: _showDatePicker,
          )
        ],
      ),
    );
  }
}

# Swiper

下载

flutter_swiper : ^1.1.6
1

执行下载命令

flutter packages get
1

引入

import 'package:flutter_swiper/flutter_swiper.dart';
1
Parameter 参数 Default 默认值 Description 简介
scrollDirection Axis.horizontal 滚动方向 Axis.vertical 垂直滚动
loop true 无限轮播开关
index 0 初始下标
autoplay false 自动播放开关
onIndexChanged void onIndexChanged(int index) 手动拖拽 或自动播放下标 改变调用
onTap void onTap(int index) 点击某个轮播 调用
duration 300.0 动画时间 单位毫秒
pagination null 设置 new SwiperPagination() 默认指示器
control null 默认分页按钮

正常放入 轮播组件

import 'package:flutter/material.dart';
import 'package:flutter_swiper/flutter_swiper.dart';

class SwiperPage extends StatefulWidget {
  SwiperPage({Key key}) : super(key: key);

  @override
  _SwiperPageState createState() => _SwiperPageState();
}

class _SwiperPageState extends State<SwiperPage> {
  List<Map> imgList = [
    {
      "url":"https://gitee.com/master0037/publicImg/raw/master/longImg4.jpg",
    },
    {
      "url":"https://gitee.com/master0037/publicImg/raw/master/longImg5.jpg",
    },
    {
      "url":"https://gitee.com/master0037/publicImg/raw/master/longImg6.jpg",
    },
    {
      "url":"https://gitee.com/master0037/publicImg/raw/master/longImg3.jpg",
    },
  ];

  @override
  Widget build(BuildContext context) {
    return Scaffold(
        appBar: AppBar(
          title: Text('SwiperPage'),
        ),
        body: Swiper(
          itemBuilder: (BuildContext context, int index) {
            return new Image.network(
              imgList[index]["url"],
              fit: BoxFit.fill,
            );
          },
          itemCount: 3, //循环遍历三次
          pagination: new SwiperPagination(),//分页器
          control: new SwiperControl(),//配置左右箭头
        ));
  }
}

# 开发写法

轮播内容 等比例 多屏幕适配 //且自动播放

import 'package:flutter/material.dart';
import 'package:flutter_swiper/flutter_swiper.dart';

class SwiperPage extends StatefulWidget {
  SwiperPage({Key key}) : super(key: key);

  @override
  _SwiperPageState createState() => _SwiperPageState();
}

class _SwiperPageState extends State<SwiperPage> {
  List<Map> imgList = [    ---------------  图片组
    {
      "url":"https://gitee.com/master0037/publicImg/raw/master/longImg4.jpg",
    },
    {
      "url":"https://gitee.com/master0037/publicImg/raw/master/longImg5.jpg",
    },
    {
      "url":"https://gitee.com/master0037/publicImg/raw/master/longImg6.jpg",
    },
    {
      "url":"https://gitee.com/master0037/publicImg/raw/master/longImg3.jpg",
    },
  ];

  @override
  Widget build(BuildContext context) {
    return Scaffold(
        appBar: AppBar(
          title: Text('SwiperPage'),
        ),
        body: Column(
          children: <Widget>[
            
              Container(
                width: double.infinity,   ---------  宽度占满 
                child: AspectRatio(
                  aspectRatio: 16/9,  //宽高比例  适配所有屏幕
                  child: Swiper(
                      itemBuilder: (BuildContext context, int index) {
                        return new Image.network(
                          imgList[index]["url"],
                          fit: BoxFit.fill,
                        );
                      },
                      itemCount: 3, //循环遍历三次
                      pagination: new SwiperPagination(),//分页器
                      control: new SwiperControl(),//配置左右箭头
                      autoplay:true,  //设置自动轮播
                    ),
                ) //等比例铺满
              ),


              Row(
                children: <Widget>[
                  Text("I am  Text")
                ],
              )           
          ],
        )
      );
  }
}

第三种写法

import 'package:flutter/material.dart';
import 'package:flutter_swiper/flutter_swiper.dart';

class SwiperPage extends StatefulWidget {
  SwiperPage({Key key}) : super(key: key);

  @override
  _SwiperPageState createState() => _SwiperPageState();
}

class _SwiperPageState extends State<SwiperPage> {
  List<Map> imgList = [
    {
      "url":"https://gitee.com/master0037/publicImg/raw/master/longImg4.jpg",
    },
    {
      "url":"https://gitee.com/master0037/publicImg/raw/master/longImg5.jpg",
    },
    {
      "url":"https://gitee.com/master0037/publicImg/raw/master/longImg6.jpg",
    },
    {
      "url":"https://gitee.com/master0037/publicImg/raw/master/longImg3.jpg",
    },
  ];

  @override
  Widget build(BuildContext context) {
    return Scaffold(
        appBar: AppBar(
          title: Text('SwiperPage'),
        ),
        body: Column(
          children: <Widget>[
            
              Container(
                width: double.infinity,
                child: AspectRatio(
                  aspectRatio: 16/9,  //宽高比例  适配所有屏幕
                  child: new Swiper(
                          layout: SwiperLayout.CUSTOM,
                          customLayoutOption: new CustomLayoutOption(
                              startIndex: -1,
                              stateCount: 3
                          ).addRotate([
                            -45.0/180,
                            0.0,
                            45.0/180
                          ]).addTranslate([
                            new Offset(-370.0, -40.0),
                            new Offset(0.0, 0.0),
                            new Offset(370.0, -40.0)
                          ]),
                          itemWidth: 300.0,
                          itemHeight: 200.0,
                          itemBuilder: (context, index) {
                            return new Container(
                              // color: Colors.grey,
                              child: new Center(///  铺满容器
                                child: Image.network(imgList[index]['url'],fit: BoxFit.contain) ,
                              ),
                            );
                          },
                          itemCount: imgList.length)
                ) //比例铺满
              ),


              Row(
                children: <Widget>[
                  Text("I am  Text")
                ],
              )           
          ],
        )
      );
  }
}

import 'package:fluttertoast/fluttertoast.dart';
1

执行代码

import 'package:flutter/material.dart';
import 'package:fluttertoast/fluttertoast.dart';

//注意必须是动态

class HomePage extends StatefulWidget {
  HomePage({Key key}) : super(key: key);

  @override
  _HomePageState createState() => _HomePageState();
}

class _HomePageState extends State<HomePage> {
  _alertDialog() async {
    var result = await showDialog(
        context: context, //获取上下文
        builder: (context) {
          return AlertDialog(
            title: Text("提示信息"),
            content: Text("您确定要删除吗?"),
            actions: <Widget>[
              FlatButton(
                child: Text("取消"),
                onPressed: () {
                  print("取消");
                  Navigator.pop(context, 'Cancle');
                },
              ),
              FlatButton(
                child: Text("确定"),
                onPressed: () {
                  print("确定");
                  Navigator.pop(context, 'OK'); //取消
                },
              ),
            ],
          );
        });
    print(result); //输入 返回值
  }

  _simpleDialog() async {
    var result = await showDialog(			--------  异步方法 
        context: context,
        builder: (context) {
          return SimpleDialog(			
            title: Text("选择内容"),
            children: <Widget>[
              SimpleDialogOption(
                child: Text("Option A"),
                onPressed: () {
                  print("Option A");
                  Navigator.pop(context, "A");
                },
              ),
              Divider(),
              SimpleDialogOption(
                child: Text("Option B"),
                onPressed: () {
                  print("Option B");
                  Navigator.pop(context, "B");
                },
              ),
              Divider(),
              SimpleDialogOption(
                child: Text("Option C"),
                onPressed: () {
                  print("Option C");
                  Navigator.pop(context, "C");   ---------  选择后 退出 并带值
                },
              ),
            ],
          );
        });
    print(result); //打印 用户选择 返回值
  }

  _modelBottomSheet() async {
    var result = await showModalBottomSheet(
        //底部弹出
        context: context,
        builder: (context) {
          return Container(		--------  嵌套 可改变 高度
            height: 300,
            child: Column(
              children: <Widget>[
                ListTile(
                  title: Text("分享 A"),
                  onTap: () {
                    Navigator.pop(context, "分享 A");
                  },
                ),
                ListTile(
                  title: Text("分享 B"),
                  onTap: () {
                    Navigator.pop(context, "分享 B");
                  },
                ),
                ListTile(
                  title: Text("分享 C"),
                  onTap: () {
                    Navigator.pop(context, "分享 C");
                  },
                ),
                ListTile(
                  title: Text("分享 D"),
                  onTap: () {
                    Navigator.pop(context, "分享 D");
                  },
                ),
              ],
            ),
          );
        });
    print(result);
  }
 
  _toast() async {
    Fluttertoast.showToast(
      msg: "This is Center Short Toast", 
      toastLength: Toast.LENGTH_SHORT, // Toast 的长度 
      gravity: ToastGravity.BOTTOM,// Toast 方位
      timeInSecForIosWeb: 1, //显示时间  IOS 效果
      backgroundColor: Colors.black,
      textColor: Colors.white,
      fontSize: 16.0  //字体大小

    );
  }

  @override
  Widget build(BuildContext context) {		----------------- 调用弹出框 事件
    return Center(			
      child: Column(mainAxisAlignment: MainAxisAlignment.center, children: [  
        RaisedButton(						
          child: Text('AlertDialog'),			------------  弹出 确定 取消 
          onPressed: _alertDialog,		
        ),
        RaisedButton(
          child: Text('SimpleDialog'),			---------- 列表类型选择
          onPressed: _simpleDialog,
        ),
        RaisedButton(
          child: Text('ShowModelButtonSheet'),
          onPressed: _modelBottomSheet,			 ---------- 底部 列表选项 
        ),
        RaisedButton(
          child: Text('ShowModelButtonSheet'),   
          onPressed: _toast,					---------- 消息提示 
        ),
      ]),
    );
  }
}

# Json 字符串 和 Map 类转换

import 'dart:convert'
var  mapData = {"name":"xxx",age:"23"}
String strData = '{"name":"xxx",age:"23"}'   //第一种定义字符串方法 
String strData = {"name":"xxx",age:"23"} as String //第二种定义字符串方法
print(json.encode(mapData));  //Map转换Json类型
print(json.deCode(mapData));  //Json字符串转换 Map类型

Home.dart

import 'dart:convert';

import 'package:flutter/material.dart';

import 'dart:convert' as convert;
import 'package:http/http.dart' as http;

//注意必须是动态

class HomePage extends StatefulWidget {
  HomePage({Key key}) : super(key: key);

  @override
  _HomePageState createState() => _HomePageState();
}

class _HomePageState extends State<HomePage> {
  String _news = '';

  @override
  void initState() {
    // TODO: implement initState
    super.initState();
    //Map 转换 Json
    // Map userInfo = {"username": "张三", "age": 20};

    // print(json.encode(userInfo));

    //Json 转换 map
    // String userInfo = {"username": "张三", "age": "20"} as String;
    // String userInfo = '{"username": "张三", "age": "20"}';
    // json.decode(userInfo);
    // Map u = json.decode(userInfo);
    // print(u["username"]);
  }

  _getData() async {	----------------------------  获取数据
    var apiUrl = "http://127.0.0.1:7001/default/getArticleList";
    var result = await http.get(apiUrl);				
    if (result.statusCode == 200) {
      print(json.decode(result.body)); //转换json字符串

      setState(() {
        this._news = json.decode(result.body); //重新渲染		
      });
        
    } else {
      print(result.statusCode);
    }
  }

  // 提交数据 
  _PostData() async {    ----------------------------  发送数据  
    var apiUrl = "http://127.0.0.1:7001/doLogin"; 
    var result = await http.post(apiUrl, body: {'username':'张三','age':'20'});
    if (result.statusCode == 200) {
       print(json.decode(result.body)); //打印请求数据
    } else {
      print(result.statusCode);
    }
  }

  @override
  Widget build(BuildContext context) {
    return Scaffold(
      appBar: AppBar(
        title: Text("AlertDialog"),
      ),
      body: Center(
        child: Column(mainAxisAlignment: MainAxisAlignment.center, children: [
          Text(this._news), //打印请求数据
          RaisedButton(
            child: Text('Get请求'),					---------------- 发送Get请求
            onPressed: _getData,
          ),
          RaisedButton(
            child: Text('Post请求'),					----------  发送Post请求
            onPressed:_PostData,
          ),
          RaisedButton(
            child: Text('Get请求数据演示Demo'),
            onPressed: () {
              Navigator.pushNamed(context, '/getDemo');  //---  跳转请求Demo
            },
          )
        ]),
      ),
    );
  }
}

GetDemo.dart

import 'package:flutter/material.dart';
import 'package:http/http.dart' as http;
import 'dart:convert';

class GetDemo extends StatefulWidget {
  GetDemo({Key key}) : super(key: key);
  @override
  _GetDemoState createState() => _GetDemoState();
}

class _GetDemoState extends State<GetDemo> {
  List _list = [];		----------------------   定义接收的空List

  @override
  void initState() {
    // TODO: implement initState
    super.initState();
    this._getData();
  }

  //------------------  获取数据
  _getData() async {
    var apiUrl = "http://a.itying.com/api/productlist";
    var result = await http.get(apiUrl);

    if (result.statusCode == 200) {
      print(result.body);
      setState(() {
        this._list = json.decode(result.body)["result"];  //List  赋值 
      });
    } else {
      print("请求失败 ${result.statusCode}");
    }
  }

  //------------------  请求数据结束
  @override
  Widget build(BuildContext context) {
    return Container(
      child: Scaffold(
        appBar: AppBar(
          title: Text('请求数据Demo'),
        ),
        body: this._list.length > 0 ? ListView(
                children: this._list.map((value){
                  return ListTile(
                    title: Text(value["title"]),// map 循环遍历时 数据
                  );
                }).toList(),
              )
            : Text("加载中..."),
      ),
    );
  }
}

# Dio 库实现网络请求

# get post put delete

Dio 是一个强大的 Dart Http请求库 支持 Restful API FormData 拦截器, 请求取消 Cookie管理 文件上传/下载 超时,自定义适配等

添加依赖

dependencies:
  dio: ^3.0.9  // 请使用pub上3.0.0分支的最新版本
1
2

# 极简的示例

import 'package:dio/dio.dart';
void getHttp() async {
  try {
    Response response = await Dio().get("http://www.baidu.com");
    print(response);
  } catch (e) {
    print(e);
  }
}

GET 请求

Response response;
Dio dio = Dio();
response = await dio.get("/test?id=12&name=wendu")
print(response.data.toString());
// 请求参数也可以通过对象传递，上面的代码等同于：
response = await dio.get("/test", queryParameters: {"id": 12, "name": "wendu"});
print(response.data.toString());

POST 请求:

response = await dio.post("/test", data: {"id": 12, "name": "wendu"});
1

多个并发请求:

response = await Future.wait([dio.post("/info"), dio.get("/token")]);
1

下载文件:

response = await dio.download("https://www.google.com/", "./xx.html");
1

以流的方式接收响应数据：

Response<ResponseBody> rs = await Dio().get<ResponseBody>(url,
  options: Options(responseType: ResponseType.stream), //设置接收类型为stream
);
print(rs.data.stream); //响应流

response = await dio.post("/info", data: formData);

    "name": "wendux",
    "age": 25,
    "file": await MultipartFile.fromFile("./text.txt",filename: "upload.txt"),
    "files": [
      await MultipartFile.fromFile("./text1.txt", filename: "text1.txt"),
      await MultipartFile.fromFile("./text2.txt", filename: "text2.txt"),
    ]
 });
response = await dio.post("/info", data: formData);

response = await dio.post(
  "http://www.dtworkroom.com/doris/1/2.0.0/test",
  data: {"aa": "bb" * 22},
  onSendProgress: (int sent, int total) {
    print("$sent $total");
  },
);

Dio 实现请求

import 'dart:convert';
import 'package:flutter/material.dart';
import 'package:dio/dio.dart';

//注意必须是动态

class HomePage extends StatefulWidget {
  HomePage({Key key}) : super(key: key);

  @override
  _HomePageState createState() => _HomePageState();
}

class _HomePageState extends State<HomePage> {
  String _news = '';

  @override
  void initState() {
    // TODO: implement initState
    super.initState();
    //Map 转换 Json
    // Map userInfo = {"username": "张三", "age": 20};

    // print(json.encode(userInfo));

    //Json 转换 map
    // String userInfo = {"username": "张三", "age": "20"} as String;
    // String userInfo = '{"username": "张三", "age": "20"}';
    // json.decode(userInfo);
    // Map u = json.decode(userInfo);
    // print(u["username"]);
  }

  _getData() async {
    var apiUrl = "http://192.168.0.5:3000/news"; //API
    Response response = await Dio().get(apiUrl);  //请求数据
    print(response.data);
  }

  // 提交数据
  _getPostData() async {
    Map jsonData = {
      "uname":"xxxxx",
      "age":20
    };
    var apiUrl = "http://192.168.0.5:3000/news"; //API
    Response response = await Dio().post(apiUrl,data: jsonData); //发送数据
    print(response.data);
  }

  @override
  Widget build(BuildContext context) {
    return Scaffold(
      appBar: AppBar(
        title: Text("Request"),
      ),
      body: Center(
        child: Column(mainAxisAlignment: MainAxisAlignment.center, children: [
          Text(this._news), //打印请求数据
          RaisedButton(
            child: Text('Dio Get请求'),
            onPressed: _getData,
          ),
          RaisedButton(
            child: Text('Dio Post请求'),
            onPressed: _getPostData,
          ),
          RaisedButton(
            child: Text('Dio Get请求数据 渲染数据演示Demo'),
            onPressed: () {
              Navigator.pushNamed(context, '/getDemo');
            },
          )
        ]),
      ),
    );
  }
}

Dio Get请求数据 Demo

import 'dart:convert';

import 'package:flutter/material.dart';
import 'package:dio/dio.dart';

class GetDemo extends StatefulWidget {
  GetDemo({Key key}) : super(key: key);
  @override
  _GetDemoState createState() => _GetDemoState();
}

class _GetDemoState extends State<GetDemo> {
  List _list = [];

  @override
  void initState() {
    // TODO: implement initState
    super.initState();
    this._getData();
  }

  //------------------  获取数据
  _getData() async {
    var apiUrl =
        "http://www.phonegap100.com/appapi.php?a=getPortalList&catid=20&page=1";
    Response result = await Dio().get(apiUrl);

    // print(result.data is String); //盘段类型
    // print(json.decode(result.data)["result"]);
      setState(() {
        
          this._list = json.decode(result.data)["result"];

      });
  }

  //------------------  请求数据结束
  @override
  Widget build(BuildContext context) {
    return Container(
      child: Scaffold(
        appBar: AppBar(
          title: Text('请求数据Demo'),
        ),
        body: this._list.length > 0    ------------- 正则遍历数据
            ? ListView(
                children: this._list.map((value) {
                  return ListTile(
                    title: Text(value["title"]), // map 循环遍历时 数据
                  );
                }).toList(),//这里必须转数组
              )
            : Text("加载中..."),
      ),
    );
  }
}

安卓打包 更换图标

文件目录

hdpi(大) 240dpi mdpi(中) 160 dpi xhdpi(超高) 320dpi xxhdpi(超超高) 480dpi xxxhdpi 640 dpi 文件夹中 png 图标

​				->  main

​						-> res

android

        android:label="flutterappbasis"  ---------   修改的app名
        android:icon="@mipmap/ic_launcher">   --   图片统一名称

# 生成keystore

keytool -genkey -v -keystore  ~/key.jks -keyalg RSA -keysize 2048 -validity 1000 -alias key
1

# flutter doctor -v

Java binary at: D:\InstallPackage\WebApp\AndroidStudio\Android\jre\bin\java
1

执行 生成

D:\InstallPackage\WebApp\AndroidStudio\Android\jre\bin\keytool -genkey -v -keystore  ~/key.jks -keyalg RSA -keysize 2048 -validity 1000 -alias key

最终报错
修改

D:\InstallPackage\WebApp\AndroidStudio\Android\jre\bin\keytool -genkey -v -keysto
re  d:\key.jks -keyalg RSA -keysize 2048 -validity 1000 -alias key
